trans-unit.source: A New Grassroots Movement By Doctors

seg-source.mrk: A New Grassroots Movement By Doctors

target.mrk: Un Nuevo Movimiento Comunitario Por Doctores

trans-unit.source: There’s a new movement in healthcare – and it’s growing from a surprising place. Instead of emerging from government or industry, it’s budding from the grassroots –from everyday physicians. The movement is democratizing health information and giving birth to a new landscape: Interactive HealthInteractive Health is supported by three pillars: quality, access, and care.

seg-source.mrk: There’s a new movement in healthcare – and it’s growing from a surprising place.
Instead of emerging from government or industry, it’s budding from the grassroots –from everyday physicians.
The movement is democratizing health information and giving birth to a new landscape:
Interactive HealthInteractive Health is supported by three pillars: quality, access, and care.

target.mrk: Hay un nuevo movimiento en la atención a la salud - y está creciendo desde un lugar sorprendente.
En vez de emerger del gobierno o de la industria, está brotando desde la comunidad - de médicos comunes.
El movimiento está democratizando la información de salud y dando a luz a un nuevo panorama:
La Salud Interactiva tiene tres pilares: calidad, acceso y atención.

trans-unit.source: Patient-Centric Physician Engagement Online

seg-source.mrk: Patient-Centric Physician Engagement Online

target.mrk: Participación Médica en Línea Centrada en el Paciente

trans-unit.source: Ron presents at ePatient Connections, the industry’s leading patient-centric communication conference. Ron shares how interactive health promotes transparency, quality, and better doctor relationships for patients.

seg-source.mrk: Ron presents at ePatient Connections, the industry’s leading patient-centric communication conference.
Ron shares how interactive health promotes transparency, quality, and better doctor relationships for patients.

target.mrk: Ron presenta en ePatient Connections, la conferencia de comunicación centrada en el paciente líder en la industria.
Ron comparte como la salud interactiva promueve transparencia, calidad y mejores relaciones con doctores para los pacientes.

trans-unit.source: Welcome to the New Era of Interactive Health

seg-source.mrk: Welcome to the New Era of Interactive Health

target.mrk: Bienvenido a la Nueva Era de Salud Interactiva

trans-unit.source: Interactive Health is not about "fixing" the broken healthcare system; it,s about engaging each of us in our health, empowering physicians to actively participate, and making health knowledge, supportive care, and motivation available to us, anytime and anywhere, so that we can live longer, healthier, happier lives.

seg-source.mrk: Interactive Health is not about "fixing" the broken healthcare system; it,s about engaging each of us in our health, empowering physicians to actively participate, and making health knowledge, supportive care, and motivation available to us, anytime and anywhere, so that we can live longer, healthier, happier lives.

target.mrk: La Salud Interactiva no se trata de "arreglar" el roto sistema de atención a la salud; se trata de que cada uno de nosotros se involucre con su salud, de dar poder a médicos para participar activamente, y de poner a nuestra disposición conocimiento de salud, medidas de sostén, y motivación, a cualquier hora y en cualquier lugar, para que podamos vivir vidas más largas, saludables y felices.

seg-source.mrk: The Untapped Power of Smiling (Video)

target.mrk: El Poder Sin Explotar de Sonreír (Video)

trans-unit.source: A written transcript of my TED talk on the social, emotional and personal benefits of smiling, with references to some of the amazing studies that provided inspiration for the talk.

trans-unit.source: It,s a New Day. Personalized

seg-source.mrk: It,s a New Day.
Personalized

target.mrk: Es un Nuevo Día.
Personalizado

trans-unit.source: The time has arrived to bring together what we,ve learned and build the foundation for true personalization in health that will help people live in an individualized way and help you lead a healthier, happier life.

seg-source.mrk: The time has arrived to bring together what we,ve learned and build the foundation for true personalization in health that will help people live in an individualized way and help you lead a healthier, happier life.

target.mrk: La hora ha llegado para juntar lo que hemos aprendido y construir la fundación de una verdadera personalización en salud que ayudará a personas a vivir de una manera individualizada y te ayudará a vivir una vida más saludable y feliz.

trans-unit.source: SMArt Health

seg-source.mrk: SMArt Health

target.mrk: Salud SMArt

trans-unit.source: A look into the "Substitutable Medical Apps, reusable technologies" program at Harvard, that is working to develop a flexible Health IT environment that will be the foundation for an iPhone like app-store for medical apps, based on shared basic components. Apple like these will help consumers to understand their healthcare data, save time, achieve better outcomes, and reduce costs.

seg-source.mrk: A look into the "Substitutable Medical Apps, reusable technologies" program at Harvard, that is working to develop a flexible Health IT environment that will be the foundation for an iPhone like app-store for medical apps, based on shared basic components.
Apple like these will help consumers to understand their healthcare data, save time, achieve better outcomes, and reduce costs.

target.mrk: Un vistazo al programa de "Substitutable Medical Apps, reusable technologies" en Harvard, que está trabajando para desarrollar un ambiente flexible de IT de salud que será la fundación para una app store para aplicaciones médicas para iPhone, basada en componentes básicos compartidos.
Aplicaciones como estas ayudarán a consumidores a comprender sus datos de atención a la salud, ahorrar tiempo, alcanzar mejores resultados, y reducir costos.

trans-unit.source: The story of how TEDx Silicon Valley was born, and an insightful review of it,s first annual event. TEDx Silicon Valley was one of the first licenses given to local communities to enable TEDsters around the world to create local independent TED events and help bring to life "ideas worth spreading."

trans-unit.source: Jun. 22, 2012 - Ron Gutman is the CEO and founder of HealthTap, which creates mobile and Web applications with the goal of connecting individuals with medical professionals. Gutman spoke with the Washington Post’s Emi Kolawole about the power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile. (Emi Kolawole/The Washington Post)"

seg-source.mrk: Jun. 22, 2012 - Ron Gutman is the CEO and founder of HealthTap, which creates mobile and Web applications with the goal of connecting individuals with medical professionals.
Gutman spoke with the Washington Post’s Emi Kolawole about the power of turning doctors into health care information curators for the Web and on mobile.
(Emi Kolawole/The Washington Post)"

target.mrk: 22 de junio de 2012 - Ron Gutman es e lCEO y fundador de HealthTap, la cual crea aplicaciones Web y móvil con la meta de conectar a individuos con profesionales de la salud.
Gutman habló con Emi Kolawole del Washington Post acerca del poder de convertir a doctores en curadores de información de atención a la salud para la Web y en dispositivos móviles.
(Emi Kolawole/The Washington Post)"

trans-unit.source: TEDx Silicon Valley is an independently organized TED event, that gathers some of the world\s leading thinkers, makers, and doers to discuss social innovation. It is a day of stimulating presentations, discussions, entertainment, and art that sparks new ideas and opportunities for all involved.

seg-source.mrk: TEDx Silicon Valley is an independently organized TED event, that gathers some of the world\s leading thinkers, makers, and doers to discuss social innovation.
It is a day of stimulating presentations, discussions, entertainment, and art that sparks new ideas and opportunities for all involved.

target.mrk: TEDx Silicon Valley es un evento TED organizado de forma independiente, que reúne a algunos de los pensadores, productores y hacedores líderes en el mundo para discutir innovación social.
Es un día de presentaciones, discusiones, entretenimiento y arte estimulante que da la chispa para nuevas ideas y oportunidades para todos los involucrados.

trans-unit.source: Hacking 4 Health

seg-source.mrk: Hacking 4 Health

target.mrk: Hacking 4 Health

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon brings together the best and most talented engineers and developers in the Bay Area, in conjunction with the HealthTap Developers Network, who are passionate about healthcare and the new Department of Health and Human Services Open Data Initiative. The first Hacking 4 Health event was hosted in 2010 and brought together over 200 developers, engineers and talented designers.

seg-source.mrk: The HealthTap Hacking 4 Health Hackathon brings together the best and most talented engineers and developers in the Bay Area, in conjunction with the HealthTap Developers Network, who are passionate about healthcare and the new Department of Health and Human Services Open Data Initiative.
The first Hacking 4 Health event was hosted in 2010 and brought together over 200 developers, engineers and talented designers.

target.mrk: El Hacking 4 Health Hackathon de HealthTap junta a los mejores y más talentosos ingenieros y desarrolladores en el Área de la Bahía, en conjunto con la Red de Desarrolladores de HealthTap, quienes están apasionados acerca de la atención a la salud y el nuevo Departamento de Salud y Servicios Humanos Iniciativa de Datos Abierta.
El primer evento de Hacking 4 Health se presentó en 2010 y juntó a más de 200 desarrolladores, ingenieros y talentosos diseñadores.

trans-unit.source: The web’s go-to repository for health info that’s actually reliable. ... over the past five months, 2,963 people have sent HealthTap thank-you notes saying that these doctor answers had saved their lives ... if someone were to ask you why healthtech is important, this is it.

... en los últimos cinco meses, 2,963 personas han enviado notas de agradecimiento a HealthTap diciendo que estas respuestas de doctores han salvado sus vidas... si alguien te preguntara por qué la atención a la salud es importante, está es la razón.

trans-unit.source: Both the personal characteristics for patient questions and the curbside consults for doctors leverage a network in ways that can bring faster relief to patients (and thereby, hopefully, reduce costs in the health care system) without risking the privacy of patients.

trans-unit.source: After a couple of months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's white-board equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI. It was a suitable location for top secret development work. There, we created the new concept of Interactive Health.

seg-source.mrk: After a couple of months at HealthTap's first headquarters (Ron Gutman's white-board equipped home office), we opened our doors at 575 High Street in a Palo Alto office suite formerly occupied by the FBI.
It was a suitable location for top secret development work.
There, we created the new concept of Interactive Health.

target.mrk: Después de un par de meses en el primer cuartel general de HealthTap (la oficina en casa de Ron Gutman equipada con un pizarrón blanco), abrimos nuestras puertas en 575 High Streen en una office suite previamente ocupada por el FBI.
Fue una apta ubicación para desarrollo de máximo secreto.
Ahí, creamos el nuevo concepto de Salud Interactiva.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's holiday Diaper Drive brought families in need basic necessities, directly improving their health and well-being. Our drive bested efforts of large companies (like Cisco) and gathered 40,000 diapers for local moms, making it one of the most successful ever in Silicon Valley.

Nuestra campaña mejoró los esfuerzos de grandes compañías (como Cisco) y reunió 40,000 pañales para mamás locales, convirtiéndolo en uno de los más exitosos en la historia de Silicon Valley.

trans-unit.source: Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011. The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.

seg-source.mrk: Following months of intense work to release HealthTap to our Beta community, we gathered for our first annual planning retreat to set our goals for 2011.
The retreat helped spark many new ideas and established a roadmap and metrics for success.

target.mrk: Después de meses de intenso trabajo para lanzar HealthTap para nuestra comunidad Beta, nos reunimos para nuestro primer retiro anual para establecer nuestras metas para el 2011.
El retiro ayudó a dar chispa a muchas nuevas ideas y establecer el mapa y las métricas para el éxito.

trans-unit.source: Hello, Dr. Tappy! (January 2011)

trans-unit.source: We care about care and positivity. Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience. Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information, available to everyone at all times.

seg-source.mrk: We care about care and positivity.
Dr. Tappy, the smiling image of the helpful physician, was created and immediately became an integral part of the HealthTap experience.
Always helpful and happy, Dr. Tappy symbolizes HealthTap's dedication to providing the best, most reliable, health information, available to everyone at all times.

target.mrk: Nos importa la atención y la positividad.
Dr. Tappy, la imagen sonriente del médico útil, fue creada e inmediatamente se convirtió en una parte integral de la experiencia HealthTap.
Siempre útil y feliz, el Dr. Tappy simboliza la dedicación de HealthTap para brindar la mejor y más confiable información de salud, disponible para todos en todo momento.

101 University (Julio 2011)

trans-unit.source: A heated battle for conference room space marked the end of our tenure at our first offices in 575 High Street. We moved on up to the former Facebook offices at an even better location – 101 University Ave., Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the heart of Palo Alto.

We moved on up to the former Facebook offices at an even better location – 101 University Ave., Suite 100, right across from the Cal Train station in the heart of Palo Alto.

target.mrk: Una acalorada batalla por espacio en la sala de conferencias marco el final de la ocupación de nuestras primeras oficinas en 575 High Street.
Nos mudamos a las previas oficinas de Facebook a una mejor ubicación - 101 University Ave., Suite 100, justo enfrente de la estación de Cal Train en el corazón de Palo Alto.

trans-unit.source: Launch of the New HealthTap (July 2012)

seg-source.mrk: Launch of the New HealthTap (July 2012)

target.mrk: Lanzamiento del Nuevo HealthTap (Julio 2012)

trans-unit.source: The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web). New features include HIPAA-secure private conversations, transparent doctor-to-doctor ratings, an interactive directory of over one million doctors, in-person appointments, and a personal health timeline. Press included positive praise from Washington Post, Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.

seg-source.mrk: The New HealthTap launched as the first-ever mobile health platform, available for everyone (iPhone, iPad, Android and Web).

New features include HIPAA-secure private conversations, transparent doctor-to-doctor ratings, an interactive directory of over one million doctors, in-person appointments, and a personal health timeline.
Press included positive praise from Washington Post, Bloomberg, Reuters, Forbes and Mashable, as well as TechCrunch and GigaOm among many other well known publications.

target.mrk: El Nuevo HealthTap lanzó su primera plataforma móvil de salud, disponible para todos (iPhone, iPad, Android y Web).

Nuevas funciones incluyen conversaciones privadas seguras conforme a HIPAA, transparentes calificaciones de doctor a doctor, un directorio interactivo de más de un millón de doctores, citas en personas, y una línea de tiempo de salud personal.
La prensa incluyó elogios positivos del Washington Post, Bloomber, Reuters, Forbes y Mashable, así como de TechCrunch y GigaOm, entre otras conocidas publicaciones.

trans-unit.source: DocScore and Top Doctors Competition (November 2012)

seg-source.mrk: DocScore and Top Doctors Competition (November 2012)

target.mrk: Docscore y la Competición de los Mejores Doctores (Noviembre 2012)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees). HealthTap’s Top Doctor Competition lets patients and doctors vote for the clinicians they think are the top ones in each field. Each doctor’s HealthTap profile displays the number of votes received from patients and other doctors.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s innovative DocScore is an objective numeric rating (like a FICO score) for doctors, taking into account public information (such as years in practice, medical education, awards, and peer-reviewed publications) as well as interactions on HealthTap (including peer-endorsements and agrees).
HealthTap’s Top Doctor Competition lets patients and doctors vote for the clinicians they think are the top ones in each field.
Each doctor’s HealthTap profile displays the number of votes received from patients and other doctors.

target.mrk: La innovadora DocScore de HealthTap es una calificación numérica objetiva (como una calificación FICO) para doctores, tomando en cuenta información pública (como años ejerciendo, educación médica, galardones, publicaciones con revisión por pares) así como interacciones en HealthTap (incluyendo respaldo de pares y de acuerdos).
La Competición del Mejor Doctor de HealthTap deja que pacientes y doctores voten por los clínicos que piensen son los mejores en cada campo.
Cada perfil de un doctor en HealthTap muestra el número de votos recibidos de pacientes y otros doctores.

trans-unit.source: DOConnect (November 2012)

seg-source.mrk: DOConnect (November 2012)

target.mrk: DOConnect (Noviembre 2012)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time. Over 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page. DOConnect makes it quick and easy to see which doctors are most often referred to by other trusted doctors and which doctors treat the same patients at the same time, providing immediate insights into how physicians share values, methods, and approaches to care.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s DOConnect is an interactive map showing the referral network of doctors and doctors who treat the same patients at the same time.
Over 30 million connections are visible via HealthTap, and each doctor’s connections are visible directly from a doctor’s HealthTap profile page.

DOConnect makes it quick and easy to see which doctors are most often referred to by other trusted doctors and which doctors treat the same patients at the same time, providing immediate insights into how physicians share values, methods, and approaches to care.

target.mrk: DOConnect de HealthTap es un mapa interactivo que muestra la red de referencia de doctores, y doctores que tratan a los mismos pacientes al mismo tiempo.
Más de 30 millones de conexiones son visibles a través de HealthTap, y las conexiones de cada doctor están visibles desde la página de perfil de un doctor en HealthTap.

DOConnect hace fácil y rápido el ver cuáles doctores les refieren más seguido otros doctores de confianza, y cuáles doctores tratan a los mismos pacientes al mismo tiempo, brindando inmediatas perspicacias acerca de como los médicos comparten valores, métodos y métodos para la atención.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Acquires Avvo Health and Grows Directory to 1.2 Million Doctors (November 2012)

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Acquires Avvo Health and Grows Directory to 1.2 Million Doctors (November 2012)

target.mrk: HealthTap Adquiere a Avvo Health y Crece su Directorio a 1.2 Millones de Doctores (Noviembre 2012)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to over 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states. At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors, with dynamic listings including education, subject matter expertise, specialties and more.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s first acquisition, health Q&A and directory service Avvo Health, expanded HealthTap’s Medical Expert Network to over 40,000 doctors in 128 specialties, and broadened local coverage across all 50 states.

At the same time, HealthTap announced the expansion of its directory coverage to include 1.2 million U.S.-licensed doctors, with dynamic listings including education, subject matter expertise, specialties and more.

target.mrk: La primera adquisición de HealthTap, el servicio de P&R de salud y directorio de Avvo Health, expandió la Red de Expertos Médicos de HealthTap a más de 40,000 doctores en 128 especialidades y expandió la cobertura local en todos los 50 estados.

Al mismo tiempo, HealthTap anunció la expansión de la cobertura de su directorio para incluir a 1.2 millones de doctores acreditados en los EE. UU., con listados dinámicos incluyendo educación, materia de destreza, especialidad y más.

trans-unit.source: Health Resolutions + Health Journey (December 2012)

target.mrk: Propósitos de Salud + Viaje de Salud (Diciembre 2012)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys. New features include health resolutions (with doctor videos and tips for meeting health goals), and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap's new interface makes it easy and intuitive to browse health information, helping users support their health journeys.

New features include health resolutions (with doctor videos and tips for meeting health goals), and a body browser, an easy way to explore symptoms and related conditions and treatments, all by clicking on an image of the human body.

target.mrk: La nueva interface de HealthTap hace fácil e intuitivo ojear información de salud, ayudando a usuarios a apoyar sus viajes de salud.

Nuevas funciones incluyen propósitos de salud (con videos y tips de doctores para cumplir metas de salud), un navegador de cuerpo, una forma fácil de explorar síntomas y condiciones y tratamientos relacionadas, todo haciendo clic en una imagen del cuerpo humano.

trans-unit.source: TipTaps (February 2013)

seg-source.mrk: TipTaps (February 2013)

target.mrk: TipTaps (Febrero 2013)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer. To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices. Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap brings doctor-created tips straight to your mobile device or computer.

To keep healthy living top of mind, users can subscribe to health topics of interest, and receive daily doctor-created tips, suggestions, or bits of advice delivered via email or by SMS push notifications to mobile devices.
Users can also discover and browse TipTaps on HealthTap.

target.mrk: HealthTap trae tips creados por doctores derecho a tu dispositivo móvil o computadora.

Para mantener vivir saludable como principal prioridad, los usuarios pueden suscribirse a temas de salud de interés, y recibir tips creados por doctores, sugerencias o un poco de consejo diario a través de correo electrónico o por notificación push de SMS a dispositivos móviles.
Los usuarios también pueden descubrir y ojear TipTaps en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: March 2013 also marked the availability of increased personalization to millions on the HealthTap platform. Now when users ask questions, they are prompted with the option to add additional personal information related to the question they are asking.
This provides doctors with relevant context and improves the specificity of the answers users receive.

target.mrk: En marzo del 2013 también marcó la disponibilidad de incrementada personalización a millones en la plataforma de HealthTap.
Ahora, cuando los usuarios hagan preguntas, se les da la opción de añadir información personal adicional relacionada con la pregunta que están haciendo.
Esto les brinda a doctores contexto relevante y mejora la especificidad de las respuestas que reciben.

trans-unit.source: In May 2013, HealthTap launched ‘AppRX’ so our users can get app recommendations from real doctors. trans-unit.source: Health2020 Event (July 2013)

seg-source.mrk: Health2020 Event (July 2013)

target.mrk: Evento Health2020 (Julio 2013)

trans-unit.source: In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020. It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.

seg-source.mrk: In the summer of 2013, HealthTap had the pleasure of hosting a group of leading engineers, designers, product managers, data experts, and innovators in diverse industries to envision and design the “future of health” in the year 2020.
It was a successful day of thought-provoking debate and ideas of how to disrupt the health space.

target.mrk: En el verano del 2013, HealthTap tuvo el placer de ser anfitrión a un grupo de ingenieros, diseñadores, gerentes de productos, expertos en datos e innovadores líderes en diversas industrias para visualizar y diseñar el "futuro de la salud" en el año 2020.
Fue un exitoso día de debate provoca ideas de cómo alterar el espacio de la salud.

trans-unit.source: First doctor conference with Top Doctors (July 2013)

seg-source.mrk: First doctor conference with Top Doctors (July 2013)

target.mrk: La primera conferencia con los Mejores Doctores (Julio 2013)

trans-unit.source: July 2013 marked the first ever HealthTap Doctors’ Conference. Doctors from around the country from multiple specialities, practice sizes, and various stages in their career offered insights and feedback on the past, present and future of HealthTap.

Doctores de todo el país y de múltiples especialidades, tamaños de consultorios, y varias etapas en sus carreras ofrecieron perspicacias y comentarios sobre el pasado, presente y futuro de HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: 10,000 lives saved (Oct 2013)

seg-source.mrk: 10,000 lives saved (Oct 2013)

target.mrk: 10,000 vidas salvadas (Oct 2013)

trans-unit.source: In October 2013, HealthTap received the 10,000th user note telling us that information on HealthTap saved a life. By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives.

By making digital health personal, we're working hard to help many more thousands all over the world live longer, healthier lives.

Al producir salud digital personal, estamos trabajando duro para ayudar a muchos miles más de personas en todo el mundo a vivir vidas más largas y saludables.

trans-unit.source: 1 billion answers served (Oct 2013)

seg-source.mrk: 1 billion answers served (Oct 2013)

target.mrk: 1 billón de respuestas servidas (Oct 2013)

trans-unit.source: Since launching our mobile health platform in July 2012, we've served over 1 billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.

seg-source.mrk: Since launching our mobile health platform in July 2012, we've served over 1 billion answers in response to users' health questions, and have created and organized the world's most extensive knowledge base of user questions matched to answers from trusted doctors.

target.mrk: Desde el lanzamiento de nuestra plataforma móvil en julio del 2012, hemos servido más de 1 billón de respuestas en respuesta a las preguntas de salud de los usuarios, y hemos creado y organizado la base de conocimientos de preguntas de usuarios asociadas a respuestas de doctores de confianza más extensa del mundo.

seg-source.mrk: Talk To Docs (Nov 2013)

target.mrk: Talk To Docs (Nov 2013)

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Labs launches it’s first app – Talk To Docs. Just speak a question, the app reads back answers from top doctors. Talk To Docs uses advanced natural language processing, artificial intelligence and advanced voice recognition technology to recognize the health topics you’re interested in, and delivers the most appropriate answer for you.

trans-unit.source: Keith Rabois

seg-source.mrk: Keith Rabois

target.mrk: Keith Rabois

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite and other successful Silicon Valley startups.

seg-source.mrk: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois.
Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer.
As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs.
Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite and other successful Silicon Valley startups.

target.mrk: Cuando start-ups revolucionarios necesitan consejo audaz, orientación activa, y comentarios honestados, van con Keith Rabois.
Keith empezó su carrera como un alto ejecutivo en PayPal, subsecuentemente sirvió en los equipos de liderazgo de LinkedIn y en Square, como el Oficial Operador en Jefe de la compañía.
Como un miembro del Consejo, guio a Yelp! y Xoom desde su primer año de creación a través de exitosos IPOs, mientras que simultáneamente invertía en otros emprendedores con la misma mentalidad.
Keith es un inversionista temprano en YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite y otros start-ups exitosos de Silicon Valley.

trans-unit.source: Bill Ericson

seg-source.mrk: Bill Ericson

target.mrk: Bill Ericson

trans-unit.source:
Bill Ericson has been working with startups his entire career as a founder, key advisor, counselor and investor. He believes that entrepreneurship drives the American economy, and that the best venture capitalists see their role as supporting and challenging entrepreneurs to their best performance. Bill’s current investment focus is the big data revolution that is driving the commercial, consumer media and health care worlds. Bill serves on the Board of Northwestern University School of Law and received his B.S.F.S. from Georgetown University of Foreign Service and J.D. from Northwestern University School of Law.

%{open_tag}MDV%{close_tag} has over $1.4 billion under management and partners with entrepreneurs to architect and build successful companies. MDV invests in businesses that address significant challenges and opportunities, including personalizing medicine. MDV-funded companies that have gone public or been acquired include: Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).

He believes that entrepreneurship drives the American economy, and that the best venture capitalists see their role as supporting and challenging entrepreneurs to their best performance.

Bill serves on the Board of Northwestern University School of Law and received his B.S.F.S. from Georgetown University of Foreign Service and J.D. from Northwestern University School of Law.

MDV-funded companies that have gone public or been acquired include:

Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; and Zip2 (AltaVista).

target.mrk: Bill Ericson ha estado trabajando con start-ups toda su carrera como un fundador, asesor clave, consejero e inversionsita.

Él cree que el espíritu empresarial impulsa la economía americana, y que los mejores inversionistas de capital de riesgo ven su rol como el de apoyar y desafiar a emprendedores para dar lo mejor de sí.
El enfoque actual de inversión de Bill es la revolución de big data que está impulsando los mundos comerciales de atención a la salud y medios para consumidores.
Bill sirve en el Consejo de la Northwestern University School of Law y recibió su B.S.F.S de Georgetown University of Foreign Service y su J.D. de Northwestern University School of Law.
%{open_tag}MDV%{close_tag} tiene más de $1.4 billones bajo su administración y socios con emprendedores para planear y construir compañías exitosas.
MDV invierte en negocios que abordan desafíos y oportunidades significativas, incluyendo la personalización de la medicina.
Compañías fundadas por MDV que se han hecho públicas o han sido adquiridas incluyen:

Agile; Broadbase (KANA); Brocade; Epigram (BRCM); FormFactor (FORM); Freshwater Software (MERQ); Ipsilon Networks (NOK); Kalpana (CSCO); Numerical Technologies (SNPS); ONI Systems (CIEN); Pivotal Technologies (BRCM); Rambus; Vantive; Vitesse; y Zip2 (AltaVista).

trans-unit.source: Tim Chang

seg-source.mrk: Tim Chang

target.mrk: Tim Chang

trans-unit.source:
Tim Chang is the Managing Director of the %{open_tag}Mayfield Fund%{close_tag}. Tim is a proven venture investor and experienced global executive. He was named on the 2011 Forbes Midas List of Top 100 Dealmakers and was featured by The Deal as one of five emerging VCs to watch. Tim invests in the mobile, gaming, digital media and enterprise applications sectors. Prior to joining Mayfield Fund, Tim spent five years as a Partner at Norwest Venture Partners, and prior to Norwest, Tim worked for Gabriel Venture Partners, and as part of the founding team of CTR Ventures. Currently, Tim serves on the advisory boards of the Verizon 4G Venture Forum, Gamestop Corporation, Yoshimoto Kogyo, the Silicon Valley Telecom Council, MIT/Stanford VLAB, CasualConnect, and GamesBeat/MobileBeat. Tim holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, and an M.S. and B.S. from the University of Michigan.

The %{open_tag}Mayfield Fund%{close_tag} has over $2.7 billion under management, and has a 41-year history of investing in relationships with entrepreneurs, institutions and our community to transform bold ideas into industry-leading companies. Mayfield's mission is to create global impact and investor value, by partnering with visionary entrepreneurs who are addressing disruptive markets. Mayfield has invested in more than 500 companies, resulting in over 100 IPOs and more than 100 mergers and acquisitions. Select notable investments include 3Com, Citrix, Compaq, and Genentech.

Tim holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, and an M.S. and B.S. from the University of Michigan.

Mayfield has invested in more than 500 companies, resulting in over 100 IPOs and more than 100 mergers and acquisitions.
Select notable investments include 3Com, Citrix, Compaq, and Genentech.

target.mrk: Tim Chang es el Director Ejecutivo del %{open_tag}Mayfield Fund%{close_tag}.
Tim es un probado inversionista de capital de riesgo y un ejecutivo global experimentado.
Fue nombrado en la lista Midas de Forbes del 2011 de los Mejores 100 Negociadores de tratos y fue destacado por The Deal como uno de los cinco IR emergentes que observar.
Tim invierte en los sectores de aplicaciones empresariales y medios móviles, digitales y de videojuegos.

Antes de unirse al Mayfield Fund, Tim paso cinco años como un Socio en Norwest Venture Partners, antes de Norwest, Tim trabajó para Gabriel Venture Partners, y como parte del equipo fundador de CTR Ventures.

Actualmente, Tim sirve en el consejo asesor del Verizon 4G Venture Forum, Gamestop Corporation, Yoshimoto Kogyo, el Silicon Valley Telecom Council, MIT/Stanford VLAB, CasualConnect y GamesBeat/MobileBeat.
Tim tiene un MBA de la Stanford Graduate School of Business, y un M.S. y un B.S. de la University of Michigan.

%{open_tag}MDV%{close_tag} tiene más de $2.7 billones bajo su administración, y tiene una historia de 41 años de invertir en relaciones con emprendedores, instituciones y nuestra comunidad para transformar audaces ideas en compañías líderes de industria.
La misión de Mayfield es crear impacto global y valor para inversionistas, al asociarse con emprendedores visionarios que están abordando mercados disruptivos.
Mayfield ha invertido en más de 500 compañías, resultando en más de 100 IPOs y más de 100 fusiones y adquisiciones.
Selectas y notables inversiones incluyen a 3Com, Compaq y Genentech.

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt

seg-source.mrk: Eric Schmidt

target.mrk: Eric Schmidt

trans-unit.source: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of %{open_tag}Innovation Endeavors%{close_tag}. Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology. From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy. Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman. Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer. Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG. Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novel, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems. Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.

seg-source.mrk: Eric Schmidt is Executive Chairman of Google and the founder of %{open_tag}Innovation Endeavors%{close_tag}.
Since joining Google in 2001, he has helped grow it from a Silicon Valley startup to a global leader in technology.
From 2001 to 2011, Eric served as Google's Chief Executive Officer, overseeing its technical and business strategy.
Eric joined Google from Novell, where he served as Chief Executive Officer from April 1997 to July 2001 and as Chairman.
Prior to Novel, he held various positions at Sun Microsystems, including serving as Chief Technology Officer and as Corporate Executive Officer.
Before joining Sun in 1983, Eric served as a Member of the Research staff at the Computer Science Lab of Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), and held positions at Bell Laboratories and ZiLOG.
Eric has also served as the Chairman of the New America Foundation, Google, Novel, and InSight Venture Partners, and as a Director of Google, Apple, and Seibel Systems.

Eric is also a member of the President's Council of Advisors on Science and Technology and the Prime Minister's Advisory Council in the U.K. Eric has Bachelor of Science and M.S. degrees in Electrical Engineering from Princeton University, and a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of California-Berkeley.

target.mrk: Eric Schmidt es el Presidente Ejecutivo de Google y el fundador de %{open_tag}Innovation Endeavors%{close_tag}.
Desde que se unió a Google en el 2001, él ha ayudado a crecer desde un start-up de Silicon Valley a un líder global en tecnología.
Desde el 2001 al 2011, Eric sirvió como el CEO de Google, supervisando su estrategia técnica y de negocios.
Eric se unió a Google de Novell, donde sirvió como CEO de abril de 1997 a julio del 2001 y como presidente.
Antes de Novel, tuvo varias posiciones en Sun Microsystems, incluyendo como CTO y CEO.

Antes de unirse a Sun en 1983, Eric sirvió como un Miembro del personal de Investigación en el Laboratorio de Ciencias Computacionales de Xerox Palo Alto Research Center (PARC), y tuvo varias posiciones en Bell Laboratories y ZiLOG.
Eric también sirvió como el Presidente de la New America Foundation, Google, Novel, e InSight Venture Partners, y como Director of Google, Apple, y Seibel Systems.

Eric también es miembro del Consejo de Asesores en Ciencia y Tecnología del Presidente y del Consejo Asesor del Primer Ministro del Reino Unido. Eric tiene una Licenciatura en Ciencias y grados de M.S. en Ingenieria Eléctrica de Princeton University, y un Ph.D. en Ciencias Computacionales de la University of California-Berkeley.

trans-unit.source: Vinod Khosla

seg-source.mrk: Vinod Khosla

target.mrk: Vinod Khosla

trans-unit.source: Vinod Khosla is the founder of Khosla Ventures, a leading venture capital firm focusing on large problems amenable to technological solutions, with an particular interest in mobile technologies. Khosla Ventures pursues both for-profit and for social impact investments. Prior to founding Khosla Ventures, he was the co-founder and former CEO of Sun Microsystems, where he pioneered open systems, and was a general partner at venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, where he continues to serve as a Partner Emeritus. Vinod has a passion for nascent technologies that can have a beneficial effect and economic impact on society, and as an investor he seeks to make a difference by helping to build companies that drive positive change by leveraging innovation.

seg-source.mrk: Vinod Khosla is the founder of Khosla Ventures, a leading venture capital firm focusing on large problems amenable to technological solutions, with an particular interest in mobile technologies.
Khosla Ventures pursues both for-profit and for social impact investments.

Prior to founding Khosla Ventures, he was the co-founder and former CEO of Sun Microsystems, where he pioneered open systems, and was a general partner at venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers, where he continues to serve as a Partner Emeritus.

Vinod has a passion for nascent technologies that can have a beneficial effect and economic impact on society, and as an investor he seeks to make a difference by helping to build companies that drive positive change by leveraging innovation.

target.mrk: Vinod Khosla es el fundador de Khosla Ventures, una compañía de capital de riesgo líder con enfoque en grandes problemas susceptibles a soluciones tecnológicas, con un interés en particular en tecnologías móviles.
Khosla Ventura busca inversiones que tengan tanto impacto social como lucro.

Antes de fundar Khosla Ventures, él fue el cofundador y el pasado CEO de Sun Microsystems, donde fue el pionero de sistemas abiertas, y fue un socio general en la compañía de capital de riesgo Kleiner Perkins

Vinod tiene una pasión por tecnologías nascientes que pueden tener un efecto benefico e impacto económico en la sociedad, y como inversionasta busca hacer una diferencia ayudando a construir compañías que impulsen cambio positivo aprovechándose de la innovación.

trans-unit.source: Bernardo directs Hewlett-Packard's Social Computing Lab, is a Senior HP Fellow, and serves on the faculty of Stanford University. He is a Fellow of the American Association for the Advancement of Science.

trans-unit.source: Aaron Levie

seg-source.mrk: Aaron Levie

target.mrk: Aaron Levie

trans-unit.source: Aaron Levie is the CEO and co-founder of Box, which he originally created as a college business project with the goal of helping people easily access their information from any location. Box was launched from Aaron's dorm room in 2005 with the help of CFO Dylan Smith. He is the visionary behind Box's product and platform strategy, which is focused on incorporating the best of traditional content management with the most effective elements of social business software. He has spoken about content and collaboration tools at events such as Fortune Brainstorm Tech, Web 2.0, Dreamforce, Accenture Global Summit, South by Southwest, and Svase. Aaron studied business at the Marshall School of Business at the University of Southern California before taking a leave of absence.

seg-source.mrk: Aaron Levie is the CEO and co-founder of Box, which he originally created as a college business project with the goal of helping people easily access their information from any location.
Box was launched from Aaron's dorm room in 2005 with the help of CFO Dylan Smith.

He is the visionary behind Box's product and platform strategy, which is focused on incorporating the best of traditional content management with the most effective elements of social business software.
He has spoken about content and collaboration tools at events such as Fortune Brainstorm Tech, Web 2.0, Dreamforce, Accenture Global Summit, South by Southwest, and Svase.
Aaron studied business at the Marshall School of Business at the University of Southern California before taking a leave of absence.

target.mrk: Aaron Levie es el CEO y cofundador de Box, la cual creo originalmente como un proyecto de negocios en la universidad, con el propósito de ayudar a la gente a acceder fácilmente a su información desde cualquier ubicación.
Box tuvo su lanzamiento desde el dormitorio de Aaron en el 2005 con la ayuda del CFO Dylan Smith.

Él es el visionario detrás de la estrategia de producto y plataforma de Box, las cuales están enfocadas a incorporar lo mejor de la administración de contenido tradicional con los elementos más efectivos del software empresarial social.
Ha hablado acerca de herramientas de colaboración y de contenido en eventos como Fortune Brainstorm Tech, Web 2.0 Dreamforce, Accenture Global Summit, South by Southwest y Svase.
Aaron estudió negocios en la Marshall School of Business en la University of Southern California antes de tomarse un permiso de ausencia.

trans-unit.source: Patients and doctors alike have long been frustrated by the one-size-fits-all approach to healthcare and the limited opportunities for finding personally relevant health information online. Ron and his team are successfully addressing the critical need for a source of trusted medical information that allows consumers to interact with doctors online in an efficient and meaningful way. The rapid growth of the HealthTap community coupled with this round of funding is further evidence of the tremendous opportunity at the intersection of web-enabled social networks and more personalized, data-driven healthcare.

seg-source.mrk: Patients and doctors alike have long been frustrated by the one-size-fits-all approach to healthcare and the limited opportunities for finding personally relevant health information online.
Ron and his team are successfully addressing the critical need for a source of trusted medical information that allows consumers to interact with doctors online in an efficient and meaningful way.

The rapid growth of the HealthTap community coupled with this round of funding is further evidence of the tremendous opportunity at the intersection of web-enabled social networks and more personalized, data-driven healthcare.

target.mrk: Tanto pacientes como doctores han estado frustrados por mucho tiempo por el enfoque de una talla para todos de la atención a la salud y las limitadas oportunidades para encontrar información de salud personalmente relevante en línea.

Ron y su equipo están atendiendo la crítica necesidad de una fuente de información médica confiable que le permita a los consumidores interactuar con doctores en línea de una forma eficiente y significativa.

El rápido crecimiento de la comunidad HealthTap acompañado de esta ronda de financiamiento es más evidencia de la tremenda oportunidad en la intersección de redes sociales en la web con la atención a la salud más personalizada y basada en datos

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of "Interactive Health"- the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.

HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.

Consumidores y médicos se están uniendo cada vez más a la conversación en línea, y la salud interactiva se merece la detenida atención de la comunidad de inversionistas.
HealthTap demuestra el potencial de este espacio emergente.

trans-unit.source: Who are the doctors on HealthTap? Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing? How are they selected?

seg-source.mrk: Who are the doctors on HealthTap?
Are they all U.S.-licensed doctors in good standing?
How are they selected?

target.mrk: ¿Quiénes son los doctores en HealthTap?
¿Todos son doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. con buena reputación?
¿Cómo son seleccionados?

trans-unit.source: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing. They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country. HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap. Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.

seg-source.mrk: All doctors on HealthTap are licensed to practice medicine in the U.S. and are in good standing.
They include doctors from leading U.S. medical institutions (like Stanford and Harvard), as well as private practices from across the country.
HealthTap Medical Experts are independent third parties, and are not employed by or affiliated with HealthTap.
Admission to the HealthTap network is by application and invitation only.

target.mrk: Todos los doctores en HealthTap están acreditados para practicar medicina en los EE.UU. y tienen buena reputación.
Están incluidos doctores de instituciones médicas líderes en los EE.UU. (como Stanford y Harvard), así como consultorios privados de todo el país.
Los Expertos Médicos de HealthTap son terceras partes independientes, y son empleados de o están afiliados con HealthTap.
La admisión a la red de HealthTap es solo por aplicación e invitación.

trans-unit.source: Diagnosis & Treatment

seg-source.mrk: Diagnosis & Treatment

target.mrk: Diagnóstico & Tratamiento

trans-unit.source: Can I get a prescription, a medical diagnosis or medical treatment on HealthTap?

seg-source.mrk: Can I get a prescription, a medical diagnosis or medical treatment on HealthTap?

target.mrk: ¿Puedo obtener una receta, un diagnóstico médico o tratamiento médico en HealthTap?

trans-unit.source: No. Prescriptions, diagnosis and medical treatment are not available on HealthTap. Please see your doctor or medical care provider for these as you normally would. Even if your real-life doctor is on HealthTap, prescriptions, diagnosis and treatment should not take place on or over the HealthTap service. HealthTap is not intended or designed to replace your doctor's independent judgment about the appropriateness or risks of symptoms, conditions or treatments (including procedures) for any given person, including you.

seg-source.mrk: No. Prescriptions, diagnosis and medical treatment are not available on HealthTap.
Please see your doctor or medical care provider for these as you normally would.
Even if your real-life doctor is on HealthTap, prescriptions, diagnosis and treatment should not take place on or over the HealthTap service.

HealthTap is not intended or designed to replace your doctor's independent judgment about the appropriateness or risks of symptoms, conditions or treatments (including procedures) for any given person, including you.

target.mrk: No. Recetas, diagnóstico y tratamiento médico no están disponibles en HealthTap.
Por favor visita a tu doctor o proveedor de atención a la salud para estas como normalmente lo harías.
Aún si tu doctor de la vida real está en HealthTap, recetas, diagnósticos y tratamientos no deben llevarse a cabo en o a través del servicio HealthTap.

HealthTap no está dirigida o diseñada para reemplazar el juicio independiente de tu doctor acerca de lo apropiado o el riesgo de síntomas, condiciones o tratamientos (incluyendo procedimientos) para ninguna persona, incluyéndote.

trans-unit.source: Asking Doctors

seg-source.mrk: Asking Doctors

target.mrk: Pregúntale a Doctores

trans-unit.source: Can I really submit a question to thousands of doctors for a free answer?

seg-source.mrk: Can I really submit a question to thousands of doctors for a free answer?

target.mrk: ¿Realmente puedo presetnar una pregunta a miles de doctores para una respuesta gratis?

trans-unit.source: Yes - it’s true! Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S. These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted. Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community). Learn more »

seg-source.mrk: Yes - it’s true!
Health questions submitted to HealthTap are submitted to our network of thousands of doctor across the U.S. These doctors try to answer every question that’s submitted.
Questions are most likely to be answered when they have not already been asked and answered, and they are good health questions (easy to understand and useful to the entire HealthTap community).
Learn more »

target.mrk: Si - ¡es verdad!
Las preguntas de salud enviadas a HealthTap son presentadas a nuestra red de miles de doctores en los EE.UU. Estos doctores intentan contestar cada pregunta que se les presenta.

Las preguntas tienen más probabilidad de ser contestadas cuando aún no han sido preguntadas y contestadas, y cuando son buenas preguntas de salud (fáciles de entender y útiles para toda la comunidad HealthTap)
Aprender más »

trans-unit.source: Why is question length limited? Can I ask a longer question?

seg-source.mrk: Why is question length limited?
Can I ask a longer question?

target.mrk: ¿Por qué se limita la longitud de las preguntas?
¿Puedo hacer una pregunta más larga?

trans-unit.source: Questions on HealthTap are limited to 150 characters to make them easy to view on mobile devices, and so that they can quickly be read and answered. Try re-phrasing or leaving out personal details to shorten questions. If you have a longer question to ask, you can make a 99 cent charitable donation and submit your question with 50 more characters, or you can ask a private question to a specific doctor on HealthTap (for a small fee).

seg-source.mrk: Questions on HealthTap are limited to 150 characters to make them easy to view on mobile devices, and so that they can quickly be read and answered.
Try re-phrasing or leaving out personal details to shorten questions.

If you have a longer question to ask, you can make a 99 cent charitable donation and submit your question with 50 more characters, or you can ask a private question to a specific doctor on HealthTap (for a small fee).

target.mrk: Las preguntas en HealthTap están limitadas a 150 caracteres para hacerlas fáciles de ver en dispositivos móviles, y para que puedan ser leídas y contestadas rápidamente.
Intenta cambiar la redacción o dejar fuera detalles personales para hacer más cortas las preguntas.

Si tieens una pregunta más larga que hacer, puedes realizar una donación caritativa de 99 centavos y enviar tu pregunta con 50 caracteres más, o puedes hacer una pregunta privada a un doctor específico en HealthTap (por una pequeña cuota).

trans-unit.source: How fast will I get a response to my question?

seg-source.mrk: How fast will I get a response to my question?

target.mrk: ¿Qué tan rápido obtendré una respuesta a mi pregunta?

trans-unit.source: Almost every question submitted to HealthTap receives an answer – especially those that are well-written. Most questions are answered promptly, often within 24 hours (some questions are answered within a few hours, or even a few minutes). Well written questions useful to the HealthTap community have the best chance of being quickly answered. The response time for questions asked for free depends on the number of other unanswered questions. If you’d like your question to receive priority (and to increase the likelihood of a fast response), you can make a charitable donation at the time you ask it.

seg-source.mrk: Almost every question submitted to HealthTap receives an answer – especially those that are well-written.
Most questions are answered promptly, often within 24 hours (some questions are answered within a few hours, or even a few minutes).
Well written questions useful to the HealthTap community have the best chance of being quickly answered.
The response time for questions asked for free depends on the number of other unanswered questions.
If you’d like your question to receive priority (and to increase the likelihood of a fast response), you can make a charitable donation at the time you ask it.

target.mrk: Casi todas las preguntas presentadas a HealthTap reciben una respuesta - especialmente aquellas que están muy bien escritas.
La mayoría de las preguntas son contestadas rápidamente, a menudo en menos de 24 horas (algunas preguntas son contestadas en pocas horas, o hasta en pocos minutos).
Las preguntas bien escritas y útiles para la comunidad HealthTap tienen la mejor probabilidad de ser contestadas rápidamente.
El tiempo de respuesta para preguntas gratuitas depende del número de preguntas sin contestar.
Si te gustaría que tu pregunta tenga prioridad (y para incrementar la probabilidad de una respuesta rápida), puedes realizar una donación caritativa en el momento que la preguntas.

trans-unit.source: Premium Service

seg-source.mrk: Premium Service

target.mrk: Servicio Premium

trans-unit.source: Where does my money go when I pay to send my question to doctors?

seg-source.mrk: Where does my money go when I pay to send my question to doctors?

target.mrk: ¿A dónde va mi dinero cuando pago para enviar mi pregunta a los doctores?

trans-unit.source: All profits from payments to improve question response time and increase question length are donated to one of the many medical charities supported by HealthTap, including: Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, and others.

seg-source.mrk: All profits from payments to improve question response time and increase question length are donated to one of the many medical charities supported by HealthTap, including:

Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, and others.

target.mrk: Todas las ganancias de los pagos para mejorar el tiempo de respuesta de las preguntas y para incrementar la longitud de las preguntas son donadas a una de las muchas caridades médicas apoyadas por HealthTap, incluyendo a:

Operation Smile, Doctors without Borders, American Red Cross, Susan G. Komen for the Cure, Direct Relief International, African Medical & Research Foundation (AMREF), Against Malaria Foundation, Nurse Family Partnership, Naya Health, Schistosomiasis Control Initiative (SCI), MAP International, Global Partners for Development, entre otras.

trans-unit.source: How much do Private Conversations cost? How long will it take to get an answer to a private question, and what if it’s is not answered?

seg-source.mrk: How much do Private Conversations cost?
How long will it take to get an answer to a private question, and what if it’s is not answered?

target.mrk: ¿Cuánto cuestan las Conversaciones Privadas?
¿Qué tanto tardará el obtener una repuesta para una pregunta privada, y qué si no es contestada?

trans-unit.source: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap. When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question. You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time. Learn more »

seg-source.mrk: There is a small fee (less than the cost of a typical co-pay for someone with comprehensive health insurance) to ask a private question directly to the doctor of your choice on HealthTap.
When you submit a private question to a doctor on HealthTap, that doctor has up to 72 hours to answer the question.
You will receive a full refund if the question is not answered within that time.
Learn more »

target.mrk: Hay una pequeña cuota (menos que el costo de un copago típico para alguien con seguro médico completo) para hacer una pregunta privada directamente al doctor de tu elección en HealthTap.
Cuando presentas una pregunta privada a un doctor en HealthTap, ese doctor tiene hasta 72 horas para contestar la pregunta.
Recibirás un reembolso completo si la pregunta no es contestada en ese tiempo.
Aprender más »

trans-unit.source: Private Conversations

seg-source.mrk: Private Conversations

target.mrk: Conversaciones Privadas

trans-unit.source: Is it possible to ask a question privately to a specific doctor of my choice using HealthTap and how are private questions different from public ones?

seg-source.mrk: Is it possible to ask a question privately to a specific doctor of my choice using HealthTap and how are private questions different from public ones?

target.mrk: ¿Es posible hacer una pregunta privada a un doctor específico de mi elección usando HealthTap, y cómo son diferentes las preguntas privadas de las públicas?

trans-unit.source: To ask your question to a specific doctor on HealthTap, send a doctor a direct message and start a Private Conversation. These messages are private and HIPAA-secure, and let you upload files (like scans or reports). Public questions submitted on HealthTap are distributed to multiple doctors and are public – both the question and the answer are visible to anyone who becomes a member on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: To ask your question to a specific doctor on HealthTap, send a doctor a direct message and start a Private Conversation.
These messages are private and HIPAA-secure, and let you upload files (like scans or reports).
Public questions submitted on HealthTap are distributed to multiple doctors and are public – both the question and the answer are visible to anyone who becomes a member on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Para hacer tu pregunta a un doctor específico en HealthTap, envía un mensaje directo a un doctor e inicia una Conversación Privada.
Estos mensajes son privados y seguros conforme a HIPAA, y te dejan subir documentos (como escaneos o reportes).

Las preguntas públicas presentadas en HealthTap son distribuidas a múltiples doctores y son públicas - tanto la pregunta como la respuesta son visibles para cualquiera que se vuelva un miembro en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: Can I make appointment requests using HealthTap?

seg-source.mrk: Can I make appointment requests using HealthTap?

target.mrk: ¿Puedo hacer solicitudes de citas usando HealthTap?

trans-unit.source: Yes! HealthTap lets you request appointments with doctors on their Virtual Practice pages. Just hit the “Request Appointment” button and send the doctor your details. The doctor or his or her office should then contact you to schedule the appointment.

seg-source.mrk: Yes!
HealthTap lets you request appointments with doctors on their Virtual Practice pages.
Just hit the “Request Appointment” button and send the doctor your details.
The doctor or his or her office should then contact you to schedule the appointment.

target.mrk: ¡Sí!
HealthTap te deja solicitar citas con doctores en sus páginas de Consultorio Virtual.
Solo presiona el botón "Solicitar Cita" y envíale al doctor tus detalles.
El o la doctor(a) o su oficina deberían de contactarte entonces para agendar la cita.

trans-unit.source: What’s a DocScore and what does it mean?

seg-source.mrk: What’s a DocScore and what does it mean?

target.mrk: ¿Qué es una DocScore y qué significa?

trans-unit.source: A DocScore is a number that reflects both publicly available information as well as a doctor’s reputation, experience, and engagement on HealthTap. The higher the number, the better. A high DocScore shows you (among other things) that the doctor is both active on HealthTap and that other doctors frequently agree with the answers that he or she provides on HealthTap.

seg-source.mrk: A DocScore is a number that reflects both publicly available information as well as a doctor’s reputation, experience, and engagement on HealthTap.
The higher the number, the better.
A high DocScore shows you (among other things) that the doctor is both active on HealthTap and that other doctors frequently agree with the answers that he or she provides on HealthTap.

target.mrk: Una DocScore es un número que refleja tanto información públicamente disponible como la reputación, experiencia y participación del doctor en HealthTap.
Entre más alto sea el número, mejor.
Una DocScore alta te muestra (entre otras cosas) que el doctor es activo en HealthTap y que otros doctores están de acuerdo frecuentemente con las respuestas que él o ella brinda en HealthTap.

trans-unit.source: What is my Health Activity, what it is used for, and how do I edit it?

seg-source.mrk: What is my Health Activity, what it is used for, and how do I edit it?

target.mrk: ¿Qué es mi Actividad de Salud, para qué se usa, y cómo la edito?

trans-unit.source:
Your Health Activity is a record of the health and related information you enter into and share with HealthTap. It is completely secure and private. Your Health Activity is used to provide you with better information on HealthTap.
 
 Your Health Activity is never visible to other members on HealthTap, but if you choose to start a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap using our new House Call feature, your real name and your Health Activity will be visible to that doctor. 
 
 You can edit your Health Profile and add to your Health Activity at any time.

seg-source.mrk: Your Health Activity is a record of the health and related information you enter into and share with HealthTap.
It is completely secure and private.

Your Health Activity is used to provide you with better information on HealthTap.\n \n Your Health Activity is never visible to other members on HealthTap, but if you choose to start a private health conversation with a doctor on HealthTap using our new House Call feature, your real name and your Health Activity will be visible to that doctor.
\n \n You can edit your Health Profile and add to your Health Activity at any time.

target.mrk: Tu Actividad de Salud es un registro de la información de salud y temas relacionados que ingresas y compartes en HealthTap.
Es completamente seguro y privado.

Tu Actividad de salud es usada para brindarte la mejor información en HealthTap.\n \n Tu Actividad de SAlud nunca es visible a los otros miembros en HealthTap, pero si eliges iniciar una conversación de salud privada con un doctor en HealthTap usando nuestra nueva función de Visita a Domicilio, tu nombre real y tu Actividad de Salud será visible a ese doctor.
\n \n Puedes editar tu Perfil de Salud y añadir a tu Actividad de Salud en cualquier momenot.

trans-unit.source: Logging In

seg-source.mrk: Logging In

target.mrk: Ingresando

trans-unit.source: Why can’t I log in?

seg-source.mrk: Why can’t I log in?

target.mrk: ¿Por qué no pudo ingresar?

trans-unit.source: To log in to HealthTap you must first register and create an account. When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use. You can change your log in information in your settings at any time. If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.

When you do this, you’ll pick an email address and password to use.
You can change your log in information in your settings at any time.
If you’ve already registered and are having trouble logging in, please contact us.

PUedes cambiar tu información para ingresar en tu configuración en cualquier momento.
Si ya te has registrado y estás teniendo problemas para ingresar, por favor contáctanos.

trans-unit.source: Follow ups

seg-source.mrk: Follow ups

target.mrk: Seguimientos

trans-unit.source: How can I follow up with a doctor, or ask for a second opinion?

seg-source.mrk: How can I follow up with a doctor, or ask for a second opinion?

target.mrk: ¿Como puede hacer seguimento con un doctor, o pedir una segunda opinión?

trans-unit.source: If you’ve asked a public question and want to follow up with the doctor who answered it, you can start a private conversation with that doctor. Similarly, if you’ve received a doctor’s opinion, you can start a private conversation on HealthTap to receive a second opinion. Private conversations allow you to upload and share documents and your health activity with the doctor.

seg-source.mrk: If you’ve asked a public question and want to follow up with the doctor who answered it, you can start a private conversation with that doctor.
Similarly, if you’ve received a doctor’s opinion, you can start a private conversation on HealthTap to receive a second opinion.
Private conversations allow you to upload and share documents and your health activity with the doctor.

target.mrk: Si has hecho una pregunta pública y quieres hacer seguimiento con el doctor que la contestó, puedes inicar una conversación privada con ese doctor.
De manera similar, si recibiste la opinión de un doctor, puedes iniciar una conversación privada en HealthTap para recibir una segunda opinión.
Las conversaciones privadas te permiten subir y compartir documentos y tu actividad de salud con el doctor.

seg-source.mrk: Join & Get Benefits

trans-unit.source: What are the benefits of joining the Medical Expert Network and how do I join?

seg-source.mrk: What are the benefits of joining the Medical Expert Network and how do I join?

target.mrk: ¿Cuáles son los beneficios de unirse a la Red de Expertos Médicos y cómo me uno?

trans-unit.source: The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page. If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android. Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute. During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing. If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.

seg-source.mrk: The benefits of HealthTap for doctors are spelled out on our doctors page.
If you are a U.S.-licensed doctor you can sign up online or by downloading the number one featured HealthTap MD app for iPhone, iPad and Android.
Signing up is quick and easy — and getting started takes less than a minute.
During the sign up process we will ask for information that is required to verify that every Medical Expert on HealthTap is a U.S. licensed physician in good standing.
If you need assistance during the sign up process, please reach out to our support team here.

target.mrk: Los beneficios de HealthTap para doctores están escritos en nuestra página de doctores.
Si eres un doctor acreditado en los EE.UU. puedes registrarte en línea o descargar la aplicación número uno, HealthTap MD para iPhone, iPad y Android.
Registrarse es fácil y rápido - y empezar toma menos de un minuto.
Durante el proceso de registro te pediremos información que es requerida para verificar que cada Experto Médico en HealthTap sea un médico acreditado en los EE.UU. con buena reputación.
Si necesitas asitencia durante el proceso de registro, por favor contacta a nuestro equipo de soporte aquí.

trans-unit.source: What is Verification?

seg-source.mrk: What is Verification?

target.mrk: ¿Qué es la Verificación?

trans-unit.source: Everyone claiming to be a U.S. licensed doctor that wants to join the Medical Expert Network is verified through a manual review process. This process ensures that all of the doctors on HealthTap have met the necessary requirements to legally practice medicine in the United States. After successful verification, a notification is sent out to confirm membership in the network. Verification typically takes between 24 and 48 hours.

seg-source.mrk: Everyone claiming to be a U.S. licensed doctor that wants to join the Medical Expert Network is verified through a manual review process.
This process ensures that all of the doctors on HealthTap have met the necessary requirements to legally practice medicine in the United States.
After successful verification, a notification is sent out to confirm membership in the network.
Verification typically takes between 24 and 48 hours.

target.mrk: Todos los que dicen ser un doctor acreditado en los EE.UU. que quieran unirse a la Red de Expertos Médicos se verifica a través de un proceso de valoración manual.
Este proceso asegura que todos los doctores en HealthTap cumplan los requerimientos para practicar medicina legalmente en los Estados Unidos.
Después de una verificación exitosa, una notificación es enviada para confirmar la membresía a la red.
La Verificación típicamente tarda entre 24 y 48 horas.

trans-unit.source: What is file sharing and how does it work?

seg-source.mrk: What is file sharing and how does it work?

target.mrk: ¿Qué es compartir documentos y cómo funciona?

trans-unit.source: Patients and doctors are now able to send digital files on HealthTap through a HIPAA-secure process. Documents and images may be uploaded and sent worry-free to assist in the transfer of information and care. Files that you are sharing and that have been shared with you are accessible in your library, which can be reached by clicking the button in the left-side menu.
