trans-unit.source: Can I get reimbursed for my participation?

seg-source.mrk: Can I get reimbursed for my participation?

target.mrk: ¿Puedo recibir compensación por mi participación?

trans-unit.source: Can I choose whether or not to respond to a private message? What is expected if I reply?

seg-source.mrk: Can I choose whether or not to respond to a private message?
What is expected if I reply?

target.mrk: ¿Puedo elegir si quiero o no responder a un mensaje privado?
¿Qué se espera si respondo?

trans-unit.source: You have the power to decide if you will respond to a private message. When you do respond to a private message you will have access to the patient’s Health Activity and any shared files associated with the message. Responding consists of answering the question posed by the patient in a 600-character answer field. You are encouraged to use photos if they will help support the information you are providing. When you are satisfied with the information. If you elect not to respond to a particular private message you may do so by selecting the “Can’t Help” button. When you do so, you have the option of referring the patient’s message to a colleague in your network. If a private message is unattended for 72 hours, your Responsiveness score will decrease, although the message is still available to view and respond to beyond 72 hours.

seg-source.mrk: You have the power to decide if you will respond to a private message.
When you do respond to a private message you will have access to the patient’s Health Activity and any shared files associated with the message.
Responding consists of answering the question posed by the patient in a 600-character answer field.
You are encouraged to use photos if they will help support the information you are providing.
When you are satisfied with the information.
If you elect not to respond to a particular private message you may do so by selecting the “Can’t Help” button.
When you do so, you have the option of referring the patient’s message to a colleague in your network.
If a private message is unattended for 72 hours, your Responsiveness score will decrease, although the message is still available to view and respond to beyond 72 hours.

target.mrk: Tienes el poder de decidir si responderas a un mensaje privado.
Cuando respondas a un mensaje privado, tendrás acceso a la Actividad de Salud del paciente y a cualquier archivo compartido asociado con el mensaje.
Responder consiste en contestar la pregunta planteada por el paciente en un campo de respuesta de 600 caracteres.
Se te alienta a usar fotos si te ayudan a apoyar la información que estás brindando.
Cuando estés satisfecho con la información.
Si eliges no responder a un mensaje privado en particular, puedes hacerlo seleccionando el botón "No Puedo Ayudar".
Cuando haces so, tienes la opción de referir el mensaje del paciente a un colega en tu red.
Si un mensaje privado no es atendido por 72 horas, tu calificación de Capacidad de Respuesta disminuirá, aunque el mensaje estará disponible para ver y responder después de las 72 horas.

trans-unit.source: Any tips on how to answer a question?

seg-source.mrk: Any tips on how to answer a question?

target.mrk: ¿Algún tipo en cómo contestar una pregunta?

trans-unit.source: When providing an answer for a patient, be mindful of the style, language, and tone of your answer in addition to the relevance of your answer in relation to the question asked — just like in your clinic! Providing thoughtful and informative answers that really “hit the mark” for a patient will increase your chances of receiving a “Thank You” which has a direct impact on your DocScore.

seg-source.mrk: When providing an answer for a patient, be mindful of the style, language, and tone of your answer in addition to the relevance of your answer in relation to the question asked — just like in your clinic!
Providing thoughtful and informative answers that really “hit the mark” for a patient will increase your chances of receiving a “Thank You” which has a direct impact on your DocScore.

target.mrk: Cuando le des una respuesta a un paciente, considera el estilo, lenguaje y tono de tu respuesta, además de la relevancia de tu respuesta en relación a la pregunta - ¡justo como en tu clínica!
Brindar respuestas informativas y meditadas que realmente "le dan al blanco" para un paciente incrementarán tus probabilidades de recibir un "Gracias" el cual tiene un impacto directo en tu DocScore.

trans-unit.source: Are follow up questions allowed?

seg-source.mrk: Are follow up questions allowed?

target.mrk: ¿Se permiten preguntas de seguimiento?

trans-unit.source: Patients will have an opportunity to pay for a shorter follow up question if they desire. You will be reimbursed for providing a short reply to follow up questions in a similar manner to the original question and responsiveness and helpfulness scores are impacted in the same fashion. Follow up answers are limited to 250 characters. Follow up questions are reimbursed at the rate of half a full question.

seg-source.mrk: Patients will have an opportunity to pay for a shorter follow up question if they desire.
You will be reimbursed for providing a short reply to follow up questions in a similar manner to the original question and responsiveness and helpfulness scores are impacted in the same fashion.
Follow up answers are limited to 250 characters.
Follow up questions are reimbursed at the rate of half a full question.

target.mrk: Los pacientes tendrán una oportunidad para pagar para una pregunta de seguimiento más corta si lo desean.

Se te compensará por brindar una respuesta corta para preguntas de seguimiento de una forma similar a la pregunta original y las calificaciones de capacidad de respuesta y utilidad son afectadas de la misma manera.
Las respuestas de seguimiento están limitadas a 250 caracteres.
Las preguntas de seguimiento son compensadas con una tarifa de la mitad de una pregunta completa.

trans-unit.source: How do I make a withdrawal?

seg-source.mrk: How do I make a withdrawal?

target.mrk: ¿Cómo realizo un retiro?

trans-unit.source: To make a withdrawal you must have a minimum balance of $100.00. Withdrawals can be made at any time in your setting menu. After your request is received you will be issued a check in the mail, PayPal payment, or a receipt confirmation your donation to a charity.

seg-source.mrk: To make a withdrawal you must have a minimum balance of $100.00.
Withdrawals can be made at any time in your setting menu.
After your request is received you will be issued a check in the mail, PayPal payment, or a receipt confirmation your donation to a charity.

target.mrk: Para hacer un retiro debes de tener un balance mínimo de $100.00.
Los retiros se pueden hacer en cualquier momento en tu menú de configuración.
Después de que tu solicitud sea recibida, se te enviará un cheque por correo, pago PayPal, o confirmación de recibido por tu donación a una caridad.

trans-unit.source: Where do I go if I'd like help or support on HealthTap?

seg-source.mrk: Where do I go if I'd like help or support on HealthTap?

target.mrk: ¿A dónde voy si quiero ayudar o apoyar en HealthTap?

trans-unit.source: You can reach out to our support desk at any time by selecting the “Feedback” button under “About HealthTap” in the left navigation menu.

seg-source.mrk: You can reach out to our support desk at any time by selecting the “Feedback” button under “About HealthTap” in the left navigation menu.

target.mrk: Puedes contactar a nuestro servicio de soporte a cualquier hora seleccionando el botón de "Comentarios" debajo de "Acerca de HealthTap" en el menú de navegación izquierdo.

trans-unit.source: What are “Known for” topics?

seg-source.mrk: What are “Known for” topics?

target.mrk: ¿Qué son los temas "Conocidos por"?

trans-unit.source: By registering, you have already selected a specialty, but we recognize that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience. We want you to be able to attract patients to your practice based on the topics you are known for in medicine and so we created topics for you to choose from that will allow you to customize your Virtual Practice on HealthTap. You are allowed to choose up to 5 known for topics and you can change them at any time.

seg-source.mrk: By registering, you have already selected a specialty, but we recognize that most doctors have several areas of practice that they are “known for” based on past training or cumulative clinical experience.

We want you to be able to attract patients to your practice based on the topics you are known for in medicine and so we created topics for you to choose from that will allow you to customize your Virtual Practice on HealthTap.
You are allowed to choose up to 5 known for topics and you can change them at any time.

target.mrk: Al registrarte, ya has seleccionado una especialidad, pero reconocemos que la mayoría de los doctores tienen varias áreas de práctica por las que son "Conocidos por" basadas en entrenamiento pasado o experiencia clínica acumulada.

Queremos que puedas atraer pacientes a tu consultorio basándote en los temas por lo que se te conoce en medicina, y por eso creamos temas para que elijas, los cuales te permitirán personalizar tu Consultorio Virtual en HealthTap.
Se te permite elegir hasta 5 temas conocido por, y puedes cambiarlos en cualquier momento.

trans-unit.source: What is the Top Doctors Competition”?

seg-source.mrk: What is the Top Doctors Competition”?

target.mrk: ¿Qué es la Competición de Los Mejores Doctores?

trans-unit.source: Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond! You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise. Learn more »

seg-source.mrk: Once you have declared your “Known For” topics you have the ability to showcase your expertise in this area and earn the #1 spot on your block, in your neighborhood, city, state, and beyond!
You can be the best in your known for areas simply by doing what you do best — helping people who are looking for your expertise.
Learn more »

target.mrk: ¡Una vez que hayas declarado tus temas "Conocido por", tienes la habilidad de lucir tu destreza en esta área y ganar el lugar #1 de tu cuadra, tu vecindario, ciudad, estado y más allá!
Puedes ser el mejor en tus áreas conocido por haciendo lo que haces mejor — ayudar a la gente que esté buscando tu destreza.
Aprender más »

trans-unit.source: Points & Levels

seg-source.mrk: Points & Levels

target.mrk: Puntos & Niveles

trans-unit.source: What are points and levels?

seg-source.mrk: What are points and levels?

target.mrk: ¿Qué son puntos y niveles?

trans-unit.source: Points are a reflection of the body of your work as a Medical Expert on HealthTap, such as your engagement with users looking for your medical expertise, the size of your network of patients and colleagues, your contribution to the collective wisdom of the community and your support of others. Unlike DocScore, which reflects a more “real-time” snapshot of your recent participation, your points and level only rise over time.

seg-source.mrk: Points are a reflection of the body of your work as a Medical Expert on HealthTap, such as your engagement with users looking for your medical expertise, the size of your network of patients and colleagues, your contribution to the collective wisdom of the community and your support of others.
Unlike DocScore, which reflects a more “real-time” snapshot of your recent participation, your points and level only rise over time.

target.mrk: Puntos son un reflejo del cuerpo de tu trabajo como un Experto Médico en HealthTap, como tu participación con usuarios que buscan tu destreza médica, el tamaño de tu red de pacientes y colegas, tu contribución a la sabiduría colectiva de la comunidad y tu apoyo hacia otros.
A diferencia de la DocScore, la cual refleja un vistazo en "tiempo real" de tu participación reciente, tus puntos y nivel solo pueden subir con el tiempo.

trans-unit.source: How do I add or remove publications that I’ve co-authored?

seg-source.mrk: How do I add or remove publications that I’ve co-authored?

target.mrk: ¿Cómo puedo añadir o eliminar publicaciones que corredacté?

trans-unit.source: Peer reviewed publications are now listed on HealthTap, and are part of your Virtual Practice. You can add, edit or remove articles that you’ve co-authored within your Profile, or add yourself as an author directly from the publications page.

seg-source.mrk: Peer reviewed publications are now listed on HealthTap, and are part of your Virtual Practice.
You can add, edit or remove articles that you’ve co-authored within your Profile, or add yourself as an author directly from the publications page.

target.mrk: Publicaciones con revisión por par ahora están listadas en HealthTap, y son una parte de tu Consultorio Virtual.
Puedes añadir, editar o eliminar artículos que has corredactado dentro de tu Perfil, o añadirte como autor directamente desde la página de publicaciones.

trans-unit.source: Who can add add a description or comments to a publication?

seg-source.mrk: Who can add add a description or comments to a publication?

target.mrk: ¿Quién puede añadir una descripción o comentarios a una publicación?

trans-unit.source: Co-authors can add and edit a shared description of an article (so consider checking with them when modifying an existing description). Any registered medical expert on HealthTap can add comments to an article. Comments and descriptions are publicly visible, and help highlight your expertise and authorship.

seg-source.mrk: Co-authors can add and edit a shared description of an article (so consider checking with them when modifying an existing description).
Any registered medical expert on HealthTap can add comments to an article.
Comments and descriptions are publicly visible, and help highlight your expertise and authorship.

target.mrk: Coautores pueden añadir y editar una descripción compartida de un artículo (así que considera revisar con ellos cuando modifiques una descripción existente).
Cualquier experto médico en HealthTap puede añadir comentarios a un artículo.
Los comentarios y descripciones son visibles públicamente, y ayudan a destacar tu destreza y redacción.

trans-unit.source: What are Curbside Consults and how do they work?

seg-source.mrk: What are Curbside Consults and how do they work?

target.mrk: ¿Qué son las Consultas de Banqueta y cómo funcionan?

trans-unit.source: Currently in beta, Curbside Consults are a way for our expert doctors to consult with the thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors on HealthTap for free. Doctors can select the specialty their consult is distributed to, and can receive relevant, detailed peer responses to their requests. Consults submitted by doctors who answer more patient questions on HealthTap are given priority – speed up the responses you receive by answering patient questions on HealthTap today.

seg-source.mrk: Currently in beta, Curbside Consults are a way for our expert doctors to consult with the thousands of U.S.-licensed doctors on HealthTap for free.
Doctors can select the specialty their consult is distributed to, and can receive relevant, detailed peer responses to their requests.
Consults submitted by doctors who answer more patient questions on HealthTap are given priority – speed up the responses you receive by answering patient questions on HealthTap today.

target.mrk: Actualmente en beta, las Consultas de Banqueta son una forma para que nuestros doctores expertos consulten con los miles de doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. en HealthTap de forma gratuita.
Los doctores pueden seleccionar la especialidad a la que su consulta está distribuida a, y pueden recibir detalladas respuestas de colegas a sus solicitudes.

Las consultas presentadas por doctores que contestan más preguntas de pacientes en HealthTap reciben prioridad - acelera las respuestas que recibes contestando a preguntas de pacientes en HealthTap hoy.

seg-source.mrk: I think Googling for information is great for many things, I just don,t think your health is one of them.
With HealthTap, you know you,re hearing from a doctor, not just another parent, or an anonymous stranger in cyberspace who doesn,t really know what they,re talking about.

target.mrk: Creo que buscar información e Google es grandioso para muchas cosas, solo no creo que tu salud sea una de ellas.
Con HealthTap, sabes que estas escuchando a un doctor, no solo otro padre, o un extraño anónimo en el ciberespacio que no sabe de qué está hablando.

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap focuses on an easy user interface that allows quick, informative interactions between patients and physicians... HealthTap is a powerful form of online participatory medicine."

seg-source.mrk: "HealthTap focuses on an easy user interface that allows quick, informative interactions between patients and physicians...
HealthTap is a powerful form of online participatory medicine."

target.mrk: "HealthTap se enfoca en una interfaz fácil de usar que permite interacciones rápidas e informativas entre pacientes y médicos...
HealthTap es una poderosa forma de medicina participativa en línea."

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is a wonderful way to get good and straightforward information out to patients who need it most beyond my own practice... HealthTap (is) the newest evolution and concept of health information on the Internet."

seg-source.mrk: "HealthTap is a wonderful way to get good and straightforward information out to patients who need it most beyond my own practice...
HealthTap (is) the newest evolution and concept of health information on the Internet."

target.mrk: "HealthTap es una maravillosa forma de diseminar buena y directa información a pacientes que más lo necesitan más allá de mi propio consultorio...
HealthTap (es) la más nueva evolución y concepto de información de salud en Internet."

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap gives you a better way to connect with your doctor, rather than when you just see him face-to-face. Using social media to get patients information ahead of visits also improves care. The more information we can get to you ahead of time, the more engaged you are as a patient."

seg-source.mrk: "HealthTap gives you a better way to connect with your doctor, rather than when you just see him face-to-face.
Using social media to get patients information ahead of visits also improves care.
The more information we can get to you ahead of time, the more engaged you are as a patient."

target.mrk: "HealthTap te dá una mejor manera de conectarte con tu doctor, en vez de solo cuando lo ves de frente.
Usar redes sociales para darle información a pacientes previo a las visitas también mejora la atención.
Entre más información te podamos dar por anticipado, más comprometido estás como paciente."

trans-unit.source: "Through HealthTap, I can help patients become empowered with education to make better choices about their care."

seg-source.mrk: "Through HealthTap, I can help patients become empowered with education to make better choices about their care."

target.mrk: "A través de HealthTap, puedo ayudar a pacientes a fortalecerse con educación para hacer mejores decisiones acerca de su atención."

trans-unit.source: "[On HealthTap I am able] to use my medical knowledge to help people with the health/medical questions without them having to worry that it has been biased by an industry or political/ratings agenda."

seg-source.mrk: "[On HealthTap I am able] to use my medical knowledge to help people with the health/medical questions without them having to worry that it has been biased by an industry or political/ratings agenda."

target.mrk: "[En HealthTap soy capaz] de usar mi conocimiento médico para ayudar a personas con sus preguntas médica/de salud sin que se tengan que preocupar de que haya sido influenciada por una agenda política/de ratings o de una industria."

trans-unit.source: "HealthTap is a great place to see what others are thinking, and answering the questions is challenging and fun."

seg-source.mrk: "HealthTap is a great place to see what others are thinking, and answering the questions is challenging and fun."

target.mrk: "HealthTap es un gran lugar para ver que están pensando otras personas, y contestar las preguntas es desafiante y divertido."

trans-unit.source: You guarantee your availability to take consults for the duration of the shift, and in exchange, are eligible for guaranteed minimum compensation payments for shifts as a function of patient demand. These doctors are preferentially routed patients before On Standby or Try Me doctors.

seg-source.mrk: You guarantee your availability to take consults for the duration of the shift, and in exchange, are eligible for guaranteed minimum compensation payments for shifts as a function of patient demand.
These doctors are preferentially routed patients before On Standby or Try Me doctors.

target.mrk: Tu garantizas tu disponibilidad para tomar consultas por la duración del turno, y a cambio, eres elegible para pagos de compensación mínima garantizada por turnos en función de la demanda de pacientes.
Estos doctores son pacientes transferidos con preferencia antes que a doctores En Espera o Pruébame.

trans-unit.source: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues. The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat. The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses. Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.

seg-source.mrk: You will be treating patients with non-emergency clinical care issues.
The most common issues include coughs, colds, respiratory problems, abdominal pain, allergies, muscular pains, minor infections, fever, influenza, nausea, rashes, sports injuries, and strep throat.
The patients you will be seeing will be physically located in the states in which you hold active medical licenses.
Or they may be patients contacting HealthTap from overseas locations.

target.mrk: Estarás tratando pacientes con problemas de atención clínica no urgentes.

Los problemas más comunes incluyen tos, resfriados, problemas respiratorios, dolor abdominal, alergias, dolores musculares, infecciones menores, fiebre, influenza, nausea, sarpullidos, lesiones deportivas y faringitis estreptocócica.
Los pacientes que verás estarán ubicados físicamente en los estados en los cuáles tienes una licencia médica activa.
O pueden ser pacientes contactando a HealthTap desde una ubicación en el extranjero.

trans-unit.source: . Doctors are chosen based on taking an active role in the HealthTap community, demonstrating clinical excellence, and getting high ratings from your colleagues and patients for your answers to questions, curated news and research, and Virtual Consults.

seg-source.mrk: Doctors are chosen based on taking an active role in the HealthTap community, demonstrating clinical excellence, and getting high ratings from your colleagues and patients for your answers to questions, curated news and research, and Virtual Consults.

target.mrk: Los doctores son elegidos en base a que tomen un papel activo en la comunidad HealthTap, demostrando excelencia clínica, y obteniendo calificaciones altas de tus colegas y pacientes por tus repuestas a preguntas, curar noticias e investigación, y Consultas Virtuales.

trans-unit.source: Yes. Because we are a 24/7/365 service, we expect our doctors to fulfill their shifts on federal holidays. If, for any reason, you will not be available for your shift, please notify us of this with at least one-week notice.

seg-source.mrk: Yes.
Because we are a 24/7/365 service, we expect our doctors to fulfill their shifts on federal holidays.
If, for any reason, you will not be available for your shift, please notify us of this with at least one-week notice.

target.mrk: Sí.
Porque somos un servicio 24/7/365, esperamos que nuestros doctores cumplan con sus turnos en días festivos federales.
Si, por cualquier razón, no estarás disponible para tu turno, por favor notifícanos de esto con al menos una semana de anticipación.

trans-unit.source: (0.25Mbps or better). We strongly advise against taking video calls on 2G, 3G, or other mobile data connections. They tend to lack sufficient bandwidth to stream videos in high quality. Mobile 4G and LTE connections are often sufficient, but these video consults will use data that count towards your monthly data plan.

Conexiones Móviles 4G y LTE son a menudo suficientes, pero estas video consultas usarán datos que cuentan hacia tu plan de datos mensual.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap, a startup enabling patients and doctors to connect via the Internet for consultations and care, is adding a significant weapon to the arsenal it already provides its physicians: lab tests.

trans-unit.source: Starting today, doctors can prescribe lab tests, get your data back to the doctor rapidly, get it interpreted in no time.

target.mrk: Desde hoy, los doctores pueden ordenar pruebas de laboratorio, lleva tus datos de regreso al doctor rápidamente, haz que los interpreten rápido.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to progress in telemedicine, some patients no longer have to go to the doctor to see a doctor. It’s an approach that could mean that both health care providers and patients save money and time by cutting down on the number of visits to the doctor’s office.

seg-source.mrk: Thanks to progress in telemedicine, some patients no longer have to go to the doctor to see a doctor.
It’s an approach that could mean that both health care providers and patients save money and time by cutting down on the number of visits to the doctor’s office.

target.mrk: Gracias al progreso en la telemedicina, algunos pacientes ya no tienen que ir al doctor para ver a un doctor.
Es un enfoque que podría significar que tanto proveedores de atención a la salud como pacientes ahorren tiempo y dinero al reducir el número de visitas a la oficina del doctor.

target.mrk: Las Mejores Aplicaciones de Salud del 2014 de HealthTap se Anuncian

trans-unit.source: What health apps do doctors actually recommend? That's what a new report from telehealth platform HealthTap sought to uncover.

seg-source.mrk: What health apps do doctors actually recommend?
That's what a new report from telehealth platform HealthTap sought to uncover.

target.mrk: ¿Qué aplicaciones de salud realmente recomiendan los doctores?
Eso es lo que un nuevo reporte por parte de la plataforma de HealthTap de telesalud quiere descubrir.

trans-unit.source: The health and fitness category in your app store is a crowded confusing place. That's why the team at HealthTap asked their network of doctors to do the hard work for you.

seg-source.mrk: The health and fitness category in your app store is a crowded confusing place.
That's why the team at HealthTap asked their network of doctors to do the hard work for you.

target.mrk: La categoría de salud y fitness en tu app store es un lugar concurrido y confuso.
Eso por eso que HealthTap le pidió a su red de doctores que hicieran la parte difícil por ti.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s work will make it much easier for us to figure out which health apps might actually be good for our health.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s work will make it much easier for us to figure out which health apps might actually be good for our health.

target.mrk: El trabajo de HealthTap nos hará mucho más fácil averiguar cuales aplicaciones de salud puede que sean buenas para nuestra salud.

trans-unit.source: ..when it comes to healthcare apps that help connect patients and doctors, [HealthTap] will help you ‘weed’ your ‘app garden.’

seg-source.mrk: ..when it comes to healthcare apps that help connect patients and doctors, [HealthTap] will help you ‘weed’ your ‘app garden.’

target.mrk: ...cuando se trata de aplicaciones de atención a la salud que ayudan a conectar pacientes y doctores, [HealthTap] te ayudará a ‘cuidar’ tu ‘jardín de aplicaciones.’

trans-unit.source: Got a health question for Google or WebMD? HealthTap has a better answer.

seg-source.mrk: Got a health question for Google or WebMD?
HealthTap has a better answer.

target.mrk: ¿Tienes una pregunta de salud para Google o WebMD?
HealthTap tiene una mejor respuesta.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Now Uses Artificial Intelligence to Offer Personalized Medical Information.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Now Uses Artificial Intelligence to Offer Personalized Medical Information.

target.mrk: HealthTap Ahora Usa Inteligencia Artificial para Ofrecer Información Médica Personalizada.

trans-unit.source: With New Year’s Resolutions in full force, HealthTap has just released a new health-makeover service designed to help users stick to their healthy commitments and finally feel good in 2015.

seg-source.mrk: With New Year’s Resolutions in full force, HealthTap has just released a new health-makeover service designed to help users stick to their healthy commitments and finally feel good in 2015.

target.mrk: Con los Propósitos de Año Nuevo a todo lo que dan, HealthTap acaba de lanzar un nuevo servicio de salud diseñado para ayudar a usuarios a apegarse a sus compromisos de salud y finalmente sentirse bien en el 2015.

trans-unit.source: By using a new app called HealthTap, people can speak with a doctor on demand, send pictures of a problem, and even copies of lab results to find out if something is serious or not.

seg-source.mrk: By using a new app called HealthTap, people can speak with a doctor on demand, send pictures of a problem, and even copies of lab results to find out if something is serious or not.

target.mrk: Usando una nueva aplicación llamada HealthTap, la gente puede hablar con un doctor on demand, enviar imágenes de un problema y hasta copias de resultados de laboratorio para averiguar si algo es serio o no.

trans-unit.source: See a Doctor Anywhere Anytime with HealthTap Mobile App

seg-source.mrk: See a Doctor Anywhere Anytime with HealthTap Mobile App

target.mrk: Ve a un Doctor En Cualquier Lugar y A Cualquier Hora con la Aplicación Móvil de HealthTap

trans-unit.source: HealthTap’s Video Chatting Doctors Want to End Your WebMD Meltdowns. HealthTap is the only company addressing patient needs from the moment they have a question about a symptom to the virtual consultation and, if necessary, all the way through to diagnosis and prescription.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap’s Video Chatting Doctors Want to End Your WebMD Meltdowns.

HealthTap is the only company addressing patient needs from the moment they have a question about a symptom to the virtual consultation and, if necessary, all the way through to diagnosis and prescription.

target.mrk: Los Doctores de Video Chat de HealthTap Quieren Acabar con Tus Crisis de WebMD.

HealthTap es la única compañía abordando necesidades de pacientes desde el momento en que tienen una pregunta acerca de un síntoma hasta la consulta virtual y, si es necesario, todo el camino hacia el diagnóstico y receta.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Offers Uber-Like Service For Seeing A Doctor. During his demo with Forbes he was able to see the doctor in two minutes...

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Offers Uber-Like Service For Seeing A Doctor.
During his demo with Forbes he was able to see the doctor in two minutes...

target.mrk: HealthTap Ofrece Un Servicio Como Uber Para Ver A Un Doctor.
Durante su demo con Forbes, él fue capaz de ver al doctor en dos minutos...

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Wants To Be Your New On-Call Doctor...founder Ron Gutman now wants to take HealthTap further, providing actual health care in addition to information.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Wants To Be Your New On-Call Doctor...founder Ron Gutman now wants to take HealthTap further, providing actual health care in addition to information.

target.mrk: HealthTap Quiere Ser Tu Nuevo Doctor De Guardia... el fundador, Ron Gutman, ahora quiere llevar a HealthTap más allá, brindado atención a la salud real además de información.

trans-unit.source: Khosla-backed startup hopes to bring doctors to patients' mobiles...the HealthTap experience is differentiated by high-definition video and checklists for people to manage their health after receiving a formal diagnosis. It is advertising-free and intends to remain that way.

seg-source.mrk: Khosla-backed startup hopes to bring doctors to patients' mobiles...the HealthTap experience is differentiated by high-definition video and checklists for people to manage their health after receiving a formal diagnosis.
It is advertising-free and intends to remain that way.

target.mrk: El start-up respaldado por Khosla espera llevar doctores a los móviles de los pacientes... la experiencia HealthTap se diferencia por video de alta definición y listados para que la gente cambie su salud después de recibir un diagnóstico formal.
Está libre de anuncios y pretende mantenerse así.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches virtual doctor visits on your phone. HealthTap...is taking a look at the entire patient experience and offering support, guidance, and information the whole way, from wellness to sickness and back again.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap launches virtual doctor visits on your phone.
HealthTap...is taking a look at the entire patient experience and offering support, guidance, and information the whole way, from wellness to sickness and back again.

target.mrk: HealthTap lanza visitas al doctor virtuales en tu teléfono.
HealthTap... está tomando un vistazo a toda la experiencia de paciente y ofrece soporte, orientación e información en todo el camino, desde la salud a la enfermedad y de regreso.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches $99 per month Prime option, including live HD video calls with doctors. The idea behind it isn’t to replace a visit to the doctor, but rather to provide peace of mind on-call.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap launches $99 per month Prime option, including live HD video calls with doctors.
The idea behind it isn’t to replace a visit to the doctor, but rather to provide peace of mind on-call.

target.mrk: HealthTap lanza su opción Prime de $99 al mes, incluyendo video llamadas HD en vivo con doctores.
La idea no es reemplazar una visita al doctor, sino brindar paz mental en cualquier momento.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime lets you video call a Doctor whatever the hour. Unless you're rich, run a hospital or have medical professionals in the family, it's not likely that you have instant access to a doctor whenever you need. ...for a monthly fee, [HealthTap] will let you video chat with specialists as and when you require.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap Prime lets you video call a Doctor whatever the hour.
Unless you're rich, run a hospital or have medical professionals in the family, it's not likely that you have instant access to a doctor whenever you need.
...for a monthly fee, [HealthTap] will let you video chat with specialists as and when you require.

target.mrk: HealthTap Prime te deja video llamar a un Doctor a la hora que esa.
A menos de que seas rico, tengas un hospital o profesionales de salud en la familia, no es probable que tengas acceso instantáneo a un doctor cuando lo necesites.
...por una cuota mensual, [HealthTap] te dejarán video chatear con especialistas como y cuando lo requieras.

trans-unit.source: Skype Your Doctor For Your Next Checkup With This App. HealthTap is bringing back the “fun” in seeing your doctor.

seg-source.mrk: Skype Your Doctor For Your Next Checkup With This App.
HealthTap is bringing back the “fun” in seeing your doctor.

target.mrk: Skype A Tu Doctor Para Tu Siguiente Chequeo Con Esta Aplicación.
HealthTap está trayendo de regreso la "diversión" a ver a tu doctor.

trans-unit.source: Medical Q&A site HealthTap adds consultations, for a fee. HealthTap says a key differentiator is that it provides ongoing support after consultations. This can include customized checklists, personalized health news, as well as reminders and notifications.

seg-source.mrk: Medical Q&A site HealthTap adds consultations, for a fee.
HealthTap says a key differentiator is that it provides ongoing support after consultations.
This can include customized checklists, personalized health news, as well as reminders and notifications.

target.mrk: El sitio de P&R Médicas, HealthTap, añade consultas, por una cuota.
HealthTap dice que una diferencia clave es que brinda soporte continuo después de las consultas.
Esto puede incluir listados personalizados, noticias de salud personalizadas, así como recordatorios y notificaciones.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap Prime Launches Today. When you need an answer and you need it now, HealthTap Prime is an incredible and safe resource. Did we mention you can video chat with a doctor almost instantly?

When you need an answer and you need it now, HealthTap Prime is an incredible and safe resource.
Did we mention you can video chat with a doctor almost instantly?

Cuando necesitas una respuesta y la necesitas ya, HealthTap Prime es un recurso increíble y seguro.
¿Mencionamos que puedes video chatear con un doctor casi instantáneamente?

trans-unit.source: All-access medical app delivers prescriptions via smartwatch HealthTap Inc., an interactive health company, unveiled its next generation digital health service today, redefining how people connect with doctors.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap reinvents itself as a mobile health concierge service. New features like virtual, mobile doctor visits and integration with pharmacy systems to process prescriptions.

New features like virtual, mobile doctor visits and integration with pharmacy systems to process prescriptions.

target.mrk: HealthTap se reinventa como un servicio concierge de salud móvil.
Nuevas funciones como visitas médicas móviles virtuales e integración con sistemas de farmacia para procesar recetas.

trans-unit.source: Can’t get out of bed? Health Tap. Prime brings the doctor to your phone (or watch) Unlike other medical apps, HealthTap’s doctors can talk with patients and then prescribe medication all without actually seeing the patient in the real world.

seg-source.mrk: Can’t get out of bed?
Health Tap.

Prime brings the doctor to your phone (or watch) Unlike other medical apps, HealthTap’s doctors can talk with patients and then prescribe medication all without actually seeing the patient in the real world.

target.mrk: ¿No puedes salir de la cama?
Health Tap.

Prime trae al doctor a tu teléfono (o reloj) A diferencia de otras aplicaciones médicas, los doctores de HealthTap pueden hablar con pacientes y recetarles medicamentos sin tener que ver al paciente en el mundo real.

trans-unit.source: Hypochondriacs rejoice! HealthTap Prime puts a doctor on your iPad at any hour HealthTap Prime service will put you in touch with a real doctor via a live video chat feature, and it will do it whenever you want.

HealthTap Prime puts a doctor on your iPad at any hour HealthTap Prime service will put you in touch with a real doctor via a live video chat feature, and it will do it whenever you want.

target.mrk: ¡Regocíjense hipocondriacos!

HealthTap Prime pone a un doctor en tu iPad a cualquiera hora El servicio de HealthTap Prime te pondrá en contacto con un doctor de verdad a través de su función de chat de video en vivo, y lo hará cuando sea que quieras.

trans-unit.source: The HealthTap Prime App Helps You Video Chat With Doctors. The app lets you indulge in video chats with medical specialists as and when you need to.

La aplicación te deja realizar video chats con especialistas médicos como y cuando lo necesites.

trans-unit.source: The new HealthTap Prime service means virtual house calls are just an iPhone away. HealthTap Prime is the first end-to-end virtual care solution that’s available to everyone, anytime, with a simple tap on a smartphone or a tablet.

HealthTap Prime is the first end-to-end virtual care solution that’s available to everyone, anytime, with a simple tap on a smartphone or a tablet.

HealthTap es la primera solución de atención virtual de principio a fin que está disponible para todos, a cualquier hora, con un simple toque en un teléfono inteligente o tableta.

Patients ask questions, Physicians answer questions.

trans-unit.source: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois. Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer. As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs. Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite, and other successful Silicon Valley startups.

seg-source.mrk: When revolutionary startups need bold advice, active coaching, and honest feedback, they go to Keith Rabois.
Keith began his career as a senior executive at PayPal, subsequently serving on the leadership teams at LinkedIn and at Square, as the company's Chief Operating Officer.
As a Board member, he guided Yelp! and Xoom from their first year of inception through successful IPOs, while simultaneously investing in other like-minded entrepreneurs.
Keith is an early investor in YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite, and other successful Silicon Valley startups.

target.mrk: Cuando start-ups revolucionarios necesitan consejo audaz, orientación activa, y comentarios honestados, van con Keith Rabois.
Keith empezó su carrera como un alto ejecutivo en PayPal, subsecuentemente sirvió en los equipos de liderazgo de LinkedIn y en Square, como el Oficial Operador en Jefe de la compañía.
Como un miembro del Consejo, guio a Yelp! y Xoom desde su primer año de creación a través de exitosos IPOs, mientras que simultáneamente invertía en otros emprendedores con la misma mentalidad.
Keith es un inversionista temprano en YouTube, Yammer, Palantir, AirBnB, Eventbrite y otros start-ups exitosos de Silicon Valley.

trans-unit.source: Sonja Perkins is the Managing Director of Menlo Ventures, where she focuses on Internet, communications, and software. Her investments and board seats include: Socialcast (VMware), Acme Packet (APKT), AssureNet Pathways (Symantic), Eloquent (ELO1), F5 Networks (FFIV), Solidcore (McAfee), and Vermeer Technologies (Microsoft). She serves as a director of the Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).

Ella sirve como un director de Western Association of Venture Capitalists (WAVC).

She has served on the boards of NearbyNow, RedFin, and ShareThis, and was responsible for investments in Alphonso Labs, Meebo, Kudo (Google), RichRelevance, and Flux (MTVNetworks).

trans-unit.source: Luc builds and grows teams, leads innovative Web products and optimizes SEO, SEM, and viral to scale online businesses to reach millions of customers. When he was 21, Luc founded www.travelpod.com, the world’s first travel blogging platform, which was later acquired by TripAdvisor/Expedia. As general manager at Expedia and then at TripAdvisor, Luc led the creation of two award-winning products: TripWow (“WebAward for Outstanding Achievement”—Web Marketing Association) and the Traveler IQ Challenge (Excellence in Social Media – CNMA). Today, he manages a top-notch team of analysts and engineers as VP of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) at TripAdvisor. He's the general manager for several TripAdvisor products like TripWow, the Traveler IQ Challenge, and TravelPod, which was named by PC Magazine as a “Top 100 site you can’t live without”. In addition to advising for HealthTap, Luc also acts as an advisor for several other incubators and high-growth startups, including FounderFuel and BusBud.

seg-source.mrk: Luc builds and grows teams, leads innovative Web products and optimizes SEO, SEM, and viral to scale online businesses to reach millions of customers.
When he was 21, Luc founded www.travelpod.com, the world’s first travel blogging platform, which was later acquired by TripAdvisor/Expedia.
As general manager at Expedia and then at TripAdvisor, Luc led the creation of two award-winning products:
TripWow (“WebAward for Outstanding Achievement”—Web Marketing Association) and the Traveler IQ Challenge (Excellence in Social Media – CNMA).
Today, he manages a top-notch team of analysts and engineers as VP of Search Engine Optimization (SEO) at TripAdvisor.
He's the general manager for several TripAdvisor products like TripWow, the Traveler IQ Challenge, and TravelPod, which was named by PC Magazine as a “Top 100 site you can’t live without”.
In addition to advising for HealthTap, Luc also acts as an advisor for several other incubators and high-growth startups, including FounderFuel and BusBud.

target.mrk: Luc construye y hace crecer equipo, lidera productos Web innovadores y optimiza SEO, SEM y negocios en línea virales para escalar para alcanzar a millones de consumidores.
Cuando tenía 21, Luc fundó www.travelpod.com, la primera plataforma de blogueo de viajes del mundo, que más tarde fue adquirida por TripAdvisor/Expedia.
Como gerente ejecutivo en Expedia y luego en TripAdvisor, Luce lideró la creación de dos productos galardonados:
TripWow (“WebAward por Logro Excepcional”—Web Marketing Association) y Desafio de CI de Viajero (Excelencia en Redes Sociales – CNMA).
Hoy, administra un equipo de élite de analistas e ingenieros como VP de Search Engine Optimization (SEO) en TripAdvisor.

Él es el director ejecutivo de varios productos de TripAdvisor como TripWow, el Desafio de CI de Viajero, y TravelPod, el cual fue nombrado por PC Magazine como uno de los "100 mejores sitios sin los que no puedes vivir".
Ademas de asesorar a HealthTap, Luc también actua como un asesor para otras incubadoras y start-ups de mucho crecimiento, incluyendo FounderFuel y BusBud.

trans-unit.source: Alex is the VP of Growth at Facebook and manages user acquisition and retention, helping drive mobile adoption, self-service advertiser/page admin acquisition, and helping drive other product adoption as required. The channels he uses tend to be: SEO/SEM, email/sms/push notification marketing and onsite merchandising. Alex also manages the internationalization team at Facebook. Prior to Facebook in 2007, Alex spent three years at eBay in email marketing. Alex holds an MSc degree in Physics from the University of Cambridge.

Antes de Facebook en el 2007, Alex pasó tres años en eBay en mercadotecnia por correo electrónico.
Alex tiene un MSc en Física de la University of Cambridge.

trans-unit.source: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone. On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals. HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere. The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD's resources: HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we're excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.

seg-source.mrk: In its current state, our healthcare system is expensive, difficult to access, and error prone.

On the brink of a massive reform in healthcare, dedicated, bright entrepreneurs and technologists can bring a great deal to the table by developing creative, forward thinking solutions that leverage health care professionals.
HealthTap is at the forefront of this development, improving patient care by creating quick, easy, and affordable access to doctors everywhere.
The future of healthcare is at the confluence of big data, smart algorithms, and simple-to-use interfaces that will provide amplification of our MD's resources:
HealthTap is breaking ground in all three, and we're excited to help them make their compelling vision a transformative reality.

target.mrk: En su estado actual, nuestro sistema atención a la salud es caro, difícil de acceder, y propenso a errores.

Al borde una masiva reforma a la atención a la salud, emprendedores y tecnólogos brillantes y dedicados pueden traer mucho a la mesa al desarrollar soluciones creativas y novedosas que se aprovechan de los profesionales de la atención a la salud.
HealthTap está a la vanguardia de este desarrollo, mejorando la atención al paciente creando acceso accesible, fácil y rápido a doctores en todos lados.
El futuro de la atención a la salud está en la convergencia de big data, algoritmos inteligentes e interfaces fáciles de usar que brindan amplificación de los recursos de nuestros MD:
HealthTap es pionero en las tres, y estamos emocionados por ayudarlos a hacer su atractiva visión una realidad transformativa.

trans-unit.source: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health. HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone's health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.

seg-source.mrk: Everyone will soon become the CEO of their own health.

HealthTap, with its phenomenal growth in combination with its unique technology, has the potential to become the triaging platform for everyone's health. I am excited to work with the HealthTap team as the company scales to provide people with unparalleled immediate access to the most trusted medical knowledge, doctors, and health services.

target.mrk: Pronto todos se convertirán en el CEO de su propia salud.

HealthTap, con su crecimiento fenomenal en combinación con su tecnología única, tiene el potencial de convertirse en la plataforma de triage para la salud de todos. Estoy emocionado por trabajar con el equipo HealthTap mientras la compañía se escala para brindar acceso inmediato y sin igual al conocimiento médico, doctores y servicios de salud más confiables.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap has the opportunity to touch everyone on the planet and to become a great enterprise—maximizing both social and economic value. It delivers value for patients, who will gain unprecedented access to doctors; value for doctors, who can treat more people more easily and cost-effectively; and value for society, which has been searching for a long time for a way to solve the healthcare dilemma of rising costs and an aging population. And given its unique and imaginative business model HealthTap is poised to become one of the most profitable businesses in the world. It’s a real game changer.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap has the opportunity to touch everyone on the planet and to become a great enterprise—maximizing both social and economic value.

It delivers value for patients, who will gain unprecedented access to doctors; value for doctors, who can treat more people more easily and cost-effectively; and value for society, which has been searching for a long time for a way to solve the healthcare dilemma of rising costs and an aging population.
And given its unique and imaginative business model HealthTap is poised to become one of the most profitable businesses in the world.
It’s a real game changer.

target.mrk: HealthTap tiene la oportunidad de tocar a todos en el planeta y de convertirse en una gran empresa - maximizando tanto el valor social como el económico.

Entrega valor para los pacientes, quienes ganaran acceso sin precedente a doctores; valor para doctores, quienes pueden tratar personas de forma más sencilla y económica; y valor para la sociedad, la cual ha estado buscando por mucho tiempo una forma de resolver el dilema de atención a la salud con los costos crecientes y una población que está envejeciendo.
Y dado su único e imaginativo modelo de negocios HealthTap está posicionado para convertirse en uno de los negocios más lucrativos del mundo.
Realmente cambia el juego.

trans-unit.source: Mark Leslie at Leslie Ventures

seg-source.mrk: Mark Leslie at Leslie Ventures

target.mrk: Mark Leslie en Leslie Ventures

trans-unit.source: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust. It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the “consumerization” of healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap embodies the powerful consumer Internet trend of moving high-value mainstream offline experiences, such as doctor-patient interactions, to the online world. The company leverages the three key innovation drivers that I'm most excited about: mobile apps that enable new kinds of rich, personalized interactions via smartphone and tablet; gamification that enhances user engagement and retention; and social mechanics, such as expert-based Q&A and reputation graphs, that facilitate deep interest and trust.

It's this kind of fresh thinking that will accelerate the “consumerization” of healthcare, and re-invigorate an extremely important and valuable industry that has been behind the IT curve and mired in inefficiency for decades.

target.mrk: HealthTap encarna la poderosa tendencia de consumidores en el Internet de mover experiencias mainstream valiosas offline, como interacciones médico-paciente, al mundo en línea. La compañía se aprovecha de tres motores de innovación clave de los cuales estoy más emocionado: aplicaciones móviles que permiten nuevas interacciones ricas y personalizadas vía teléfono inteligente y tabletas; ludificación que mejora las interacciones y retención de usuarios; y mecánicas sociales; como P&R de expertos y gráficos de reputación, que facilitan profundo interés y confianza.

Es este tipo de pensamiento fresco que acelerará la “consumidorización” de la atención a la salud, y volver a vigorizar una industria extremadamente importante y valiosa que ha estado detrás de la curva de IT y que ha estado inmersa en la ineficiencia por décadas.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap is helping define the new field of “Interactive Health”—the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information. Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community. HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap is helping define the new field of “Interactive Health”—the sector that is moving consumer health information to new platforms, like smartphones and tablets, to provide portability and immediate access to actionable information.
Consumers and physicians are increasingly joining the online conversation, and interactive health deserves the close attention of the investment community.
HealthTap demonstrates the potential of this emerging space.

target.mrk: HealthTapestá ayudando a definir el nuevo campo de “Salud Interactiva” - el sector que está moviendo información de salud para el consumidor a nuevas plataformas, como teléfonos inteligentes y tabletas, para brindar portabilidad y acceso inmediato a información accionable.
Consumidores y médicos se están uniendo cada vez más a la conversación en línea, y la salud interactiva se merece la detenida atención de la comunidad de inversionistas.
HealthTap demuestra el potencial de este espacio emergente.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap's approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.

seg-source.mrk: HealthTap's approach is brilliant. It delivers what people miss about medicine most: a highly engaging personalized experience, with trusted doctors sharing helpful information.

target.mrk: El abordaje de HealthTap es brillante. Entrega lo que la gente más extraña sobre la medicina: una experiencia sumamente personalizada, con doctores confiables compartiendo información útil.

trans-unit.source: Mari Baker, Investor, Board of Trustees of Stanford University

seg-source.mrk: Mari Baker, Investor, Board of Trustees of Stanford University

target.mrk: Mari Baker, Inversionista, Consejo de Fideicomisarios de Stanford University

trans-unit.source: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare. Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there's nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing. What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.

seg-source.mrk: I tend to [invest in] things that are e-commerce, like healthcare.
Things that are actually more complex to do and solving a real problem in a big market where there's nobody else doing what HealthTap is doing.
What HealthTap is doing is revolutionary.

target.mrk: Yo tiendo [invertir en] cosas que son comercio en línea, como la atención a la salud.
Las cosas que son más complejas de hacer, y resolver un problema real en un mercado grado donde nadie está haciendo lo que HealthTap está haciendo.
<em>Lo que HealthTap está haciendo es revolucionario.<\em>

trans-unit.source: I love working at HealthTap! I’ve already worked on several exciting projects on the engineering team. This is the first internship I’ve had where I’m really making a difference. It’s been awesome to work in such a positive environment with other passionate people, while helping to save lives and make people feel good, not to mention the awesome perks like Isaac's/Gagan's chocolate shop. :)

trans-unit.source: There aren’t many places that you can get an experience like you would at HealthTap. From day one you are empowered to take on projects that make a significant difference and you are expected to achieve those goals but given the support to learn and hone new skills to get there. That would be a fulfilling internship in it of itself but what separates HealthTap is the opportunity to solve challenging and important problems with an incredibly talented and passionate group of people.

trans-unit.source: Working at HealthTap this summer has been a great experience. <em>De proyectos desafiantes y orientación significativa hasta almuerzos en balcones y sillas que desafían la física, HealthTap lo tiene todo.

trans-unit.source: There are so many reasons why I'm excited to walk into the HealthTap office every morning. In many internship programs, mentors play a supportive role and teach students a lot. What makes the HealthTap internship program unique, though, is that I have been given some real, important responsibilties and I am therefore able to play a role in the growth of a movement. The people here are energetic and inspiring. Every day, I'm challenged to take charge of a project and see it through to completion. It's so exciting to work at HealthTap!

seg-source.mrk: There are so many reasons why I'm excited to walk into the HealthTap office every morning.
In many internship programs, mentors play a supportive role and teach students a lot.
What makes the HealthTap internship program unique, though, is that I have been given some real, important responsibilties and I am therefore able to play a role in the growth of a movement.
The people here are energetic and inspiring.
Every day, I'm challenged to take charge of a project and see it through to completion. It's so exciting to work at HealthTap!

target.mrk: Hay muchas razones por las cuales estoy emocionada por entrar a las oficinas de HealthTap cada mañana.
En muchos programas de prácticas profesionales, los mentores juegan un rol de soporte y les enseñan mucho a los estudiantes.

Lo que hace único al programa de prácticas profesionales de HealthTap, es que se me han dado responsabilidades reales e importantes y por lo tanto soy capaz de tener un rol en el crecimiento de un movimiento.
Las personas aquí son energéticas e inspiradoras.
Cada día, soy desafiado para tomar el control de un proyecto y llevarlo hasta el final. ¡Es muy emocionante trabajar en HealthTap!

trans-unit.source: The excitement about HealthTap Prime, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere, has been phenomenal. Real HealthTap users and doctors were so inspired by using HealthTap Prime, they couldn’t wait to share their experiences. “As parents, using HealthTap Prime has really given us peace of mind knowing that we can contact a doctor 24/7,” shared dad Tristen OBrien on %{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.

seg-source.mrk: The excitement about HealthTap Prime, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere, has been phenomenal.
Real HealthTap users and doctors were so inspired by using HealthTap Prime, they couldn’t wait to share their experiences.
“As parents, using HealthTap Prime has really given us peace of mind knowing that we can contact a doctor 24/7,” shared dad Tristen OBrien on %{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.

target.mrk: La emoción acerca de HealthTap Prime, nuestro nuevo servicio especial que te conecta a ti y a tus seres queridos con un doctor vía chat en video o texto, cuando sea, donde sea.
Los usuarios y doctores reales de HealthTap fueron tan inspirados por usar HealthTap Prime, que no pudieron esperar por compartir sus experiencias.
“Como padres, usar HealthTap Prime realmente nos ha dado paz mental sabiendo que podemos contactar un doctor 24/7,” compartió Tristen OBrien, un papá, en{open_link}Good Morning America%{close_link}.

trans-unit.source: If you’d like more information on how you might participate in these media interviews to inspire more caring doctors and help more people like you, please %{open_link}share details of your story here%{close_link} or email us at stories@healthtap.com with the best way to reach you. There are no associated costs, and if there are any travel expenses, we’ll cover them for you.

seg-source.mrk: If you’d like more information on how you might participate in these media interviews to inspire more caring doctors and help more people like you, please %{open_link}share details of your story here%{close_link} or email us at stories@healthtap.com with the best way to reach you.
There are no associated costs, and if there are any travel expenses, we’ll cover them for you.

target.mrk: Si quieres más información acerca de cómo podrías participar en estas entrevistas mediáticas para inspirar a más doctores bondadosos y ayudar a más personas como tú, por favor %{open_link}comparte detalles de tu historia aquí%{close_link} o envíanos un correo electrónico a stories@healthtap.com con la mejor forma de ponernos en contacto contigo.
No hay costos asociados, y si hubiera gastos por el viaje, los cubriremos por ti.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations on your pregnancy and thank you for taking us with you on this exciting journey. Pregnancy can come with many questions, and we’re here to answer them every step of the way. We’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere. You too can get doctor advice, prescriptions and even reminders from top doctors right from your mobile device or personal computer.

seg-source.mrk: Congratulations on your pregnancy and thank you for taking us with you on this exciting journey.
Pregnancy can come with many questions, and we’re here to answer them every step of the way.

We’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}, our new special service that connects you and your loved ones with a top doctor via video or text chat anytime, anywhere.
You too can get doctor advice, prescriptions and even reminders from top doctors right from your mobile device or personal computer.

target.mrk: Felicidades por tu embarazo, y gracias por llevarnos contigo en este emocionante viaje.
El embarazo puede traer muchas preguntas, y estamos aquí para contestarlas a cada paso del camino.

Estamos encantados por ofrecer una %{open_link}prueba gratis de HealthTap Prime%{close_link}, nuestro nuevo servicio especial que te conecta a ti y a tus seres queridos con un doctor vía chat en video o texto, cuando sea, donde sea.
Tú también puedes obtener consejo, recetas y hasta recordatorios de los mejores doctores desde tu dispositivo móvil o computadora personal.

trans-unit.source: We know your baby’s health is top of your mind and we’re here to make sure you get fast answers to any questions you might have about your child’s care and well-being. That’s why we’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}. Our new premium service that will allow you connect instantly with a top U.S doctor via video or text chat.

That’s why we’re delighted to offer you a %{open_link}free trial of HealthTap Prime%{close_link}.
Our new premium service that will allow you connect instantly with a top U.S doctor via video or text chat.

target.mrk: Sabemos que la salud de tu bebé es tu principal prioridad, y estamos aquí para asegurarnos que obtengas respuestas rápidas a cualquier pregunta que puedas tener acerca de la atención y el bienestar de tu bebé.
Es por eso que estamos encantados por ofrecerte una %{open_link}prueba gratis de HealthTap Prime%{close_link}.
Nuestro nuevo servicio premium te dejará conectarte instantáneamente con uno de los mejores doctores de los EE.UU. vía chat de texto o video.

trans-unit.source: Wondering if your baby’s sleeping habits are normal? Is it just a cough or something more? Or what about that rash? Our doctors are ready to answer your questions anytime, day or night.

Is it just a cough or something more?
Or what about that rash?
Our doctors are ready to answer your questions anytime, day or night.

Nuestros doctores están listos para contestar tus preguntas a cualquier hora, día o noche.

trans-unit.source: We noticed that you signed up for HealthTap Prime on %{date}, but you haven’t experienced a Virtual Consult with one of our top doctors. Remember, our caring physicians are on call for you night and day, 24/7, to consult at your convenience. Why not reach out now and talk to one of them? No question is too small, no concern too trivial. Our goal is to delight you and make you smile and feel good!

seg-source.mrk: We noticed that you signed up for HealthTap Prime on %{date}, but you haven’t experienced a Virtual Consult with one of our top doctors.
Remember, our caring physicians are on call for you night and day, 24/7, to consult at your convenience.
Why not reach out now and talk to one of them?
No question is too small, no concern too trivial.
Our goal is to delight you and make you smile and feel good!

target.mrk: Notamos que te regístrate a HealthTap Prime el %{date}, pero que no has experimentado una Consulta Virtual con uno de nuestros mejores doctores.
Recuerda, nuestros bondadosos médicos están de guardia día y noche, 24/7 para consultar a tu conveniencia.
¿Por qué no contactas y hablas con uno?
Ninguna pregunta es demasiado pequeña, ninguna preocupación demasiado trivial.
¡Nuestra meta es encantarte para hacerte sonreír y sentirte bien!

trans-unit.source: I came across HealthTap when I was short of breath. I was suffering with lower back pain and HealthTap doctors said it could be a collapsed lung. Seeing this, naturally I was worried. I called 911 and was transported to the emergency room. I was released 2 days ago & I'm healing nicely..thanx 2 ur website...you saved my life! I thank you from the bottom of my heart :-)

seg-source.mrk: I came across HealthTap when I was short of breath.
I was suffering with lower back pain and HealthTap doctors said it could be a collapsed lung.
Seeing this, naturally I was worried.
I called 911 and was transported to the emergency room.
I was released 2 days ago & I'm healing nicely..thanx 2 ur website...you saved my life!
I thank you from the bottom of my heart :-)

target.mrk: Me topé con HealthTap cuando me faltaba el aire.
Estaba sufriendo de dolor en la espalda baja y los doctores de HealthTap dijeron que podía ser un pulmón colapsado.
Al ver esto, naturalmente me preocupé.
Llame al 911 y me transportaron a la sala de emergencias.
Me dieron de alta en 2 días & estoy sanando muy bien..graxias a tu sitio...¡salvaron mi vida!
Les agradezco desde el fondo de mi corazón :-)

trans-unit.source: We noticed that you included a question in your thank-you note to %{expert}. We’d be delighted to help you get an answer to your question. You can do so in two ways.

trans-unit.source: First, you can ask it using our free “Ask Doctors” service. Top doctors answer members’ questions—often within minutes—so you get a personalized response to your health concerns. Or you can schedule a real-time video or audio Virtual Consult with a doctor (a premium service). We’re sure you’ll be delighted with the results either way!

Top doctors answer members’ questions—often within minutes—so you get a personalized response to your health concerns.
Or you can schedule a real-time video or audio Virtual Consult with a doctor (a premium service).
We’re sure you’ll be delighted with the results either way!

Los mejores doctores contestan las preguntas de los miembros - a menudo en minutos - para que puedas obtener una respuesta personalizada a tus preocupaciones de salud.
O puedes agendar una Consulta Virtual de audio o video en tiempo real con un doctor (un servicio premium).
¡Estamos seguros que estarás encantado con los resultados de las dos formas!

trans-unit.source: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.

seg-source.mrk: Be easy to understand: Questions must be in English, easy to understand, and about health or wellness topics.

target.mrk: Sé fácil de entender: Las preguntas deben de ser en inglés, fáciles de entender, y acerca de temas de salud o bienestar.

trans-unit.source: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication. Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.

seg-source.mrk: Check spelling of words and medicines: Medications in different countries use different names, so be sure to include the generic name of the medication.

Our experts are U.S.-licensed doctors and rarely answer questions about uniquely foreign medications they are not familiar with, or about hospitals or procedures in other countries that they have not visited.

target.mrk: Verifica la ortografía de palabras y medicinas: Los medicamentos usan nombres diferentes en diferentes países, así que asegúrate de incluir el nombre genérico del medicamento.

Nuestros expertos son doctores acreditados en los EE.UU. y raramente contestan preguntas acerca de medicamentos únicos al extranjero con los que no están familiarizamos, o acerca de hospitales o procedimientos en otros países que no han visitado.

trans-unit.source: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable. Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer. You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

seg-source.mrk: Ask meaningful questions: Questions must include enough detail to be meaningful and answerable.
Naming a topic (for example, “headache?”) without asking something specific, doesn,t give the doctor enough information to accurately answer.
You can consider mentioning gender, duration, age range, or body area affected.

target.mrk: Haz preguntas significativas: Las preguntas deben incluir suficiente detalle para ser significativas y contestables.
Nombrar un tema (por ejemplo, "'¿dolor de cabeza?") sin preguntar algo específico, no le da suficiente información al doctor para contestar acertadamente.
Puedes considerar mencionar el género, duración, grupo de edad, o área corporal afectada.

trans-unit.source: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.

seg-source.mrk: Stay private: Do not include your name, names of other people, or doctors, names.

target.mrk: Mantente privado: No incluyas tu nombre, nombres de otras personas o de doctores.

trans-unit.source: We know you’ve been waiting a while for an answer to your question, and we’d like to thank you for your patience. We also want to let you know that not all questions on HealthTap receive answers. A question is likely to go unanswered if it lacks detail, if the question is unclear, or if it contains terms with which the doctors are not familiar. Your question is much more likely to receive a response if you improve it by editing and resubmitting it.

Tu pregunta es mucho más probable de recibir una respuesta si la mejoras editándola y reenviándola.

I am so thrilled that I am part of your Heath Tap consultant group because you have given me the opportunity to share my unique combination of knowledge and experience as a retired US Air Force Colonel medical officer with experience in general surgery, aerospace medicine, cancer medicine, emergency medicine, and anatomic and clinical pathology.

This is our chance as physicians to create true wealth by sharing our knowledge and experience with those who seek elucidations of different illnesses and comfort in their inner selves before proceeding in making their own difficult decisions on what to do next. We are all humans helping humanity and that is why we are physicians who offer comfort and who are always willing to heal the very sick and the least fortunate in life, and making certain to do no harm to anybody, anywhere, anytime.
Dr. Hermilando Payen, Pathology

You may have heard that the very first case of Ebola in the U.S. was diagnosed in Texas last week. HealthTap doctors are ready and willing to help with any questions you have, including information about early symptoms and how the virus spreads. With HealthTap Prime you don’t need to schedule and wait for an appointment, or even leave your home; connect immediately with a doctor on HealthTap Prime, and get the peace of mind that you and your family are safe.
